recentChanges: Fixes and improvements
comments: This is one of the best apps among the others. Price is reasonable. But do not take it if you want to use it with your partner. Cloud has a huge lag

I like the format this app uses for tracking much better than others. Most others look like a spreadsheet, or you have to enter in feedings as you start. This has a better layout, and you can add things later if you forget. updates 1/19-syncing notification bar is now getting stuck. 1/20-Not fixed on version 2.7.4, worse. Now it won't sync at all 1/21-2.7.5 app is finally working on my phone, but my husband cannot sync and is seeing Google login failed. I am quickly losing interest in this app

Update: how often does this app sync with drive, exactly? Because I've just rebooted my phone and a whole week of entries are gone. This is absolutely unacceptable for a paid app. (Well, actually it's unacceptable for ANY app, even the free ones). (old review :Purchased premium version, but I can't find how to use the new features. Maybe add a tutorial?)

This app is amazing. It's my favorite app that I use. It keeps up with the baby's age, lets you add multiple children, tracks sleeping, feeding, stroller walks, milestones, dr visits, and much more. You can add notes and pictures, and there is even white noise options for sleeping. It's the best baby app I've used. The only thing I wish it did was keep track of the color and texture of bowel movements like other apps do. Other than that, this app is perfect.

The app does what is says in the description, and my wife and I love it! what we don't love are the bugs... it's very common for the db to experience corruption, such as an odd combination of day and night mode, loss of baby name, age, and events, requiring us to restore from backup, and sometimes re typing entries from memory. also, the ads force scroll you to the top of the page when a new ad appears. my wife purchased the app and we share libraries, but i still get ads.

title: Parenting Guru - let's nurture values in kids
description:
Science says that the 90% of a Child’s Brain Developed up to the Age of five. It is also proved that child can learn the things very fast up to the age of 12.  Keeping this fact in the mind, team majestic garbh sanskar has taken an initiative for unique parenting app i.e. Parenting Guru. 

Parenting - It is just not a process of raising the children, Parenting is nurturing the values and ethics right from the childhood. It is all about providing them an atmosphere so that they can grow like flower.

Parenting Guru app is a unique app in the segment. It is not only focusing on tips and health care issues of kids. Parenting Guru app understands the requirement of parent in modern era. This is the only app in the area of parenting which talks and provide rich information and material to nurture values and ethics in the child.

For parents, Parenting Guru provides guideline and material to raise the kids. This material and information would be helpful to the parents to inculcate values in kids, and provide standard guidelines to upbring the child in positive environment.

This app is available in three languages: Gujarati, Hindi and in English.

Parenting Guru App includes (not limited to following):

·        Material to understand Child Psychology

·        Information for ideal child

·        Information for ideal parent

·        Do’s and Don’t for Parents

·        Age wise tips

·        Articles on Parenting

·        Calendar Images with quotations

·        Posters

·        Ideal Personalities and their quotation, which could be pasted on the wall of kids room to motivate the kids to learn about those great personalities

·        Summary from auto Biography

·        Videos by Saints and Experts on parenting

·        Parenting Movies and Dramas

·        Child Stories

·        Child Activities

·        Library

title: Baby Care and Girls Play Nursery Game For Kids
description:
Welcome to Baby care and girls play a game for kids and toddlers. Grandparents are so excited because their first grandchild is growing and he is so funny and naughty. You as a game player have a responsibility to help the mommy along with grandparents and also improve the mommy parental skills. It’s virtual talkative baby care and nursery game for girls. Mommy needs your help as she is the first time caring for the newborn baby. It’s a complete fun game for a mommy and for her newborn baby child. Learn how to care mommy, new baby, care the newborn baby. This game is all about baby care, play fun, and baby daily activities.

This family game covers all the activities we do in our baby early childhood life. To become a babysitter in this baby care game and help the baby to complete fun-filled activities. This game helps Family to learn daily activities with lots of fun.

Take care of the newborn baby with a baby spa shower in the nursery bathroom. Apply baby oil, change her diaper, use powder on rashes, wear a new diaper, give her stunning feeder milk and baby cereals. Give the best food to the baby in the baby nursery and maternity care center.

Features
Give the baby bath in the nursery with shampoo and soap, your baby is dirty. Wipe her clean with hands. Make the bubbles and play with her. Rinse her off with water and he's all clean. Baby in the playground and have a lot of fun. Enjoy with him in cleaning the playground, fixing the damage swing and slider. Help ground staff with planting the new plants and flowers. Baby is tired and needs medical care, check the temperature and give her some treatment with injection, tablets, and drip. Change his diaper and wear the new stylish one. Make and cook the cake for a newborn baby and serve with some beautifully decorated creams, jellies, and fruits. DressUp the baby with amazing outfits, glasses, and baby caps. Clean the baby room and fix the unplaced items. Decorate his room and call the whole family and serve the food.

Contact Us
Let us know what you want! Issues? Suggestions? Development Support? Contact us any time at minorsgamesstudio@gmail.com

Facebook page
https://www.facebook.com/MinorsGamesStudio/

For Parents and Guardians
This app may include advertising for certain third parties which will redirect users to third-party sites. About your privacy, this app may enable the collection of limited user data by its carefully selected providers (e.g. ad networks) for limited purposes described in our Privacy Policy (e.g. serve contextual ads and measure their performance). For more information please read our Privacy Policy at https://sites.google.com/site/minorsgamesstudio/privacy-policy

title: Babies & Kids - Educational Games
description:
This is an application designed in order to combine the entertainment and learning of children with the incorporation of knowledge of reading, writing and speaking. At the same time they will develop memory, improve their concentration and their creativity.

The game invites to share moments of teaching and fun between parents and children.

The application interface is colorful and full of surprises which will keep the children's attention.

Children will learn to pronounce and know the letters of the alphabet, numbers, colors, sounds of animals, among other things.

With the Drum  the whole family can let their imagination fly to compose rhythms and songs, explore sounds and develop musical skills.

title: Baby care !
description:
Looking after a baby is not easy, but at the same time interesting and enjoyable. If your little fidget goes to kindergarten or school, our new game is just for him! After all, playing it - your child will be able to look at himself from the side. It will give an opportunity to play mother to find out what a real babysitter is doing and what really is caring for a baby! Meet our new exciting game, which both boys and girls will definitely like - "Baby Care".
All the kid requires care and attention. Make every effort to surround him with care and affection. Please your little one. Play ball with him, rattle or robot. After all, playing with a child is very interesting. Do not forget to bathe and feed him, take care of a sound and full sleep. Have some fun! Pop balls and stack colorful puzzles. Using various musical instruments, such as a piano or xylophone, compose your music. Play the drums and find out what sounds various animals make. What the kid really wants at the moment - tooltips will show. Get the most out of your baby care and find out what true happiness is - a baby’s smile.

Main features:
• opportunity to choose a baby you want to care for;
• funny music and sound effects;
• mini-games with great diversity of game scenes.

Visit our website: http://yovogames.com 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/YOVOstudio 
Facebook: https://facebook.com/yovogames

title: Baby Phone - Games for Family, Parents and Babies
description:
Educational music baby games FOR THE WHOLE FAMILY, including PARENTS, babies, children of all ages and all the family. This fun music game will entertain your baby, kids, toddlers and the entire family for hours on end with classic american nursery rhymes. 

You and your child will love these educational baby games. Includes animals buttons that children can touch to hear the sound they make. Animal sounds include cat, dog, farm animals.

Plays Nursery Rhymes, Lullabies, Songs and lots of Sound Effects that your kid will love playing. All content is free.

Babyphone really is one of the best games for babies in the United States of America. Your children will be occupied playing these games for hours on end. It will keep your toddler entertained for hours with the catchy nursery rhymes and fun graphics. These games for babies will entertain for hours on end.

This is one of the most fun baby games for a six month old to one year old to 2 year old baby. Also ideal for Toddlers who will still appreciate and sing along to the music and nursery rhymes.

** FEATURES **

★ Musical phone that plays piano sounds when numbered keys are touched and makes musical calls 
★ Lots of pre-bundled Nursery Rhymes that simulate calls  
★ Tons of musical games for hours of enjoyment  
★ Add your own music and images to play during a call. Your kid will be able to listen to any music that you have added. The possibilities of music that this game can play is limited only by your music collection.  
★ record your own singing and play it back to your child  
★ Lots of sound effects to play with during a musical call  
★ 10" Tablet supported 
★ 8" Tablet supported
 ★ 7" Tablet supported 
 ★ Lock your phone so that your children cannot accidentally exit “Babyphone”.

Your children will love bobbing to the nursery rhymes and making sound effects. Give these great American baby games a try. You won't regret it.

Permissions Explained
-------------------------------

Following are the permissions we require, along with an explanation for each

READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE/WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE - For when you choose to "Add from my music". We need to be able to allow you to choose an MP3 or music file located on your SD card, and thus this permission is required to read those files. This screen can by found by navigating: Menu -> Settings -> Add more Songs.

RECORD_AUDIO/WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE - For  when you choose to "Add a new Recording" and we need to record you talking/singing. This screen can by found by navigating: Menu -> Settings -> Add a new Recording.


Licenses 
-------------  

1. "Yankee Doodle Dandy" by Quantum Music Works  
2. "London Bridge" by Quantum Music Works
 3. "Oh Where, Oh Where has my little dog gone" by Quantum Music Works 
 4. "Row, Row, Row your boat" by Quantum Music Works

comments: I couldn't let my baby play with this because there were ad banners in the interface. The baby could be playing and then get interuppted when they click on the ad. So irritating! I'm happy to have an app with ads or to pay for an app but this ruins it.
Ads for a childrens game? Whoever designed this game mustve been a special kind of moron. This game is designed for babies n children.. they dont need any ads.. remove the ad bar or i report

Ads are terrible. As soon as my daughter touches it the browser automatically opens and closes the app. I'd happily pay a couple dollars for an ad free version. She has the phone in her hand for maybe a few seconds and boom. Touches an add then passes it to me and says fix it. Literally all I do is back out of the ad the whole time she has it. Neither one of us enjoy it. Fix it please

The app is great and the music is nice, but my 10 month old can and will quickly press the "disabled" buttons until he gets into the rest of the phone. If there were an option like the one in the app settings to press the certain colored circle a certain number of times or require a passcode to exit the app, the app would be better.

My baby sister loves playing with my phone and I didnt have any apps she could play on so I downloaded this, and so did the rest of my family. She really enjoys playing on it so thank you. I dont understand the people that keep complaining about adds. there hasn't been a single add since I got it!

title: Princess New Baby's Day Care
description:
The sun is raising, the sun is calling, from hills, from curtains. It's a fabulous new day for our beloved little princess!
We know that the family has just welcomed their new buddle of joy into the world. After all the excitement over the cute little girl, it's time to get down to the real business. They may be royals, but it’s still not easy for them to take care of a teeny-tiny baby. Now her royal highness needs you to lend a hand with the adorable baby Princess and give the little one your love. Caring for a little royal may be quite the same as caring for any baby. You still need to deal with things like feeding, dressing, bathing and entertaining the little one… and after a long day, nothing can be more comfortable than a warm bed. Put her in bed, and read her a bedtime story to send her off to dreamland. The sun says goodbye, and moon murmurs goodnight. Sweet dream, sweet night.

How to Play:
Open the game to enter the palace. Wow, the little beauty is up. Greet her with a big smile and do her morning routine: comb her hair, change the diaper, and feed her with some milk... Oh, look at her. The milk is dribbling right out of her mouth, let's gently wipe the milk away. The little rosy cheek wants to go out for a picnic, so she needs you to give her some advice on what to wear today. A cute pink dress, a tiny fancy tiara, and a cool sunglass will be amazing. Okay, put her into the stroller and…Oh wait, let's do a little something to make the stroller even cuter. You know she will be more than happy to see her stroller decked out. Phewww~ everything is settled. Let's go and enjoy the outdoor time! Don't forget to give her a regular check-up when she's back from the trip: measure the pressure, give her an injection…Aww, she's freaking out getting a shot. Don't worry, a cool toy room will definitely blow her mind and ease the pain. So why wait? Let's take the little darling to the toy room and have fun with her.

Features:
- Learn life lessons while having fun
- Cool toy room with endless surprises will definitely wow you
- Lovely picture wall keeps fond memories
- Fun health check-up is arranged 
- Enjoy interactive activities with a dose of fun

About Libii Game:
With over 300 million downloads and growing, Libii is committed to creating innovative games for kids. We'll keep working on establishing a good relationship with both parents and their children and bringing a healthy, happy atmosphere for them.
Visit us: http://www.libii.com/
Like us: http://www.facebook.com/LibiiGame
Contact us:
Got any ideas? Suggestions? Need technical support? Please feel free to contact us 24/7 at WeCare@libii.com

Need You Know:
This app is totally free to download and play, some basic items are also free to use, but some additional items need you to purchase and pay to unlock. Therefore, if you do not want to use these items, please turn off the in-app purchase in your settings. Thanks.

title: HiMommy - Pregnancy Tracker App
description:
Have you just found that you are pregnant? Are you expecting a child? - Congratulations! It is amazing news! HiMommy helps future mothers during pregnancy.

The HiMommy application will accompany you day by day in an exciting journey that is pregnancy! Thanks to the application, you get notifications and information from your unborn baby every day. 
It has a lot of things to tell you! 

Why does the HiMommy application should be with you during your pregnancy? 
🍼 You will know how your baby is developing each day. 
🍼 You will hear your baby say pleasant words directly to you
🍼 You will find out what magical things are happening in your body every day.
🍼 You will know how fast your child is growing and how big it is in a given week 
🍼 You will be prepared for your baby’s birth 
🍼 You will know what to avoid during pregnancy and how to treat yourself well
🍼 You can save your measurements to track normal body weight  


There is no other application on the market that informs you every day about your child's development and allows you to build a relationship with it.

The application gives mothers a simple to use, clickable list:
- 39 most important things to take to the hospital for mom
- 15 most important things to take to the hospital for baby
- 54 most important things to have at home

We would like to make this special time remembered for a long time.

HiMommy Team

title: Baby Growth chart WHO
description:
This growth tracking app allows the user to keep track of weight, size and head circumference and map them on a graph together with the WHO standards.

Functionality:
- From baby to toddler (5 years)
- No limit on the amount of children
- Beautiful generated graphs
- Your data is mapped together with the WHO data on the graph
- Track weight, height, size
- Simple no nonsense app

summary: Add multiple children and track their weight, size and head circumference.
recentChanges:
Hotfix: no longer crashes because of incomplete child data, nor because of the fact that the default boy value was seen as incomplete child data

New and improved UI (Special thanks to Jessie van Petegem)
Added export functionality
Added fullscreen mode in graph view
Minor bugfixing, such as not updating the changed image correctly
Stays longer on months while zooming out on the graphs
comments: No English units, no way to see exact percentile, no BMI or weight vs height curves, export doesn't appear to work, no adjustments for Pre-Term birth, measurements show up in the wrong place on the graph, keeps crashing. Pretty graphs though...

title: Toddlers Learning Baby Games - Free Kids Games
description:
“Toddlers Learning Baby Games - Free Kids Games” is a fun educational app for 2 year old and 3 year old babies with a collection of 20+ interactive learning games for toddlers to play and learn easily with fun educational Games.
To teach your pre-k kiddo color, shapes,English Alphabet, phonics, counting numbers, Musical notes and tracing.
The interactive games are a great mode of education as children enter kindergarten as kinesthetic learners.
Twenty high quality toddler games for 2-4 year old, keeps the baby enchanted with the experience of the kids fun games. The learning-based toddler’s educational activities are perfect for babies to inculcate inquisitiveness in their early childhood.
The Toddler learning games encourages kids to learn at their own pace. No winning and no losing keep the kid amused for hours. Rewards and appreciation earned at the end of each activity boost the kid’s morale. Each quiz in itself act as baby toy game for the little ones. Adorable stickers can be collected in a box after scoring enough points.

** Baby Games are designed to enhance following skills
1. Colorful & engaging activities for young minds.
2. Kids Games for foundation stage of primary school.
3. Helps to develop skills for early learning while keeping kids busy and engaged.
4. Games for cognitive skills for kids.
5. Hand-eye coordination using early learning games.
6. Concentration and Memory development in infants.
7. Visual perception enhancements for babies with balloon pop games. 
8. Digital Baby Toy games
9. Fine Motor skills of your baby
10. Introducing child to basic musical notes using a Piano, Xylophone and Drums.
11. Baby coloring games to introduce colors for toddlers.
12. Introducing "Twinkle twinkle little star" rhyme for babies and infants. 

13. Baby Lullaby, using white noise sound like sound of rain and car to help infant sleep.

Toddlers educational games is great mode of learning for preschoolers. It helps to inculcate interest and positive attitude towards learning since a very early age of preschool children. Learning by doing or Experiential learning is one of the most recommended way to introducing basic concepts to infants and babies.

Quoting experts on kid's learning styles:
"Children enter kindergarten as kinesthetic and tactual learners, moving and touching everything as they learn. By second or third grade, some students have become visual learners. During the late elementary years some students, primarily females, become auditory learners. Yet, many adults, especially males, maintain kinesthetic and tactual strengths throughout their lives." (Teaching Secondary Students Through Their Individual Learning Styles, Rita Stafford and Kenneth J. Dunn; Allyn and Bacon, 1993).


** Privacy
1. Privacy policy: http://www.greysprings.com/privacy
2. We do not collect any personal information about kids

title: Piyo - Newborn Baby Care Tracker
description:
Keep an eye on your baby development with Piyo, a newborn baby care tracker. Breastfeeding, diaper changing and baby sleep tracker, child development milestones and more! This is a must-have for any parent who’d like to create a nursing routine and make sure their baby is growing healthy day by day. 

No more need to have several child care apps: Piyo is an all-in-one digital baby journal where you can log the most important information in your post pregnancy period.
* Baby breastfeeding tracker
* Pumping tracker
* Baby feed timer
* Baby eating and diaper tracker
* Baby growth tracker

Thanks to the variety of functions, Piyo baby tracker makes postpartum life much easier. Whether it’s baby food or sleep, height, weight or medical conditions, the app will store baby nursing info as well as baby milestones month to month.

◆Built-in sharing function◆
Childcare info is shared immediately, so both parents can check on the baby's records anytime. On days when daddy is taking care of the baby while mommy is out, mommy can still have peace of mind by checking the baby eating tracker and milk amounts when daddy records them.

◆Record types◆
Nursing, Formula, Pumped breast milk, Baby food, Snacks, Poop, Pee, Sleep, Temperature, Height, Weight, Baths, Walks, Coughing, Rashes, Vomiting, Injuries, Medicine, Hospitals, and any other information you like, as well as a childcare diary (with photos)

◆Unique features◆
・Designed for easy, one-handed operation even while nursing, etc.
・Equipped with time bar function providing daily babycare summary at a glance
・Automatically aggregates and displays one-day amounts for nursing time, milk quantity, sleeping time, etc.
・Summarizes weekly variation in meals, sleep, bowel movements, and temperature in easily viewable graph
・Enables you to check how baby is growing with a baby growth chart
・Notifies you of the next nursing time: there is no way you can miss pumping, eating or pampers changing with Piyo baby feeding and diaper tracker. 

It’s not easy to grow a baby. But having Piyo as a post pregnancy companion and newborn tracker makes parenting more organized and thus less stressful. Once you start keeping a child journal and log all developmental milestones, you’ll find how simple it’s to nurture your infant and share important details between parents. 

Check the baby food tracker to see what your newborn eats at this particular stage and how s/he reacts to this food. Consult their nap tracker to find out when they need to sleep. Look through the pump log to know exactly when it’s time to get milk. Add your baby’s age, height, weight to the milestone tracker and observe the infant development week by week.

Create the best nursing routine with Piyo daily baby tracker! Accurate records = less stress = happy parenting. Track and grow a healthy baby!
descriptionHTML:
Keep an eye on your baby development with Piyo, a newborn baby care tracker. Breastfeeding, diaper changing and baby sleep tracker, child development milestones and more! This is a must-have for any parent who’d like to create a nursing routine and make sure their baby is growing healthy day by day.

No more need to have several child care apps: Piyo is an all-in-one digital baby journal where you can log the most important information in your post pregnancy period.
* Baby breastfeeding tracker
* Pumping tracker
* Baby feed timer
* Baby eating and diaper tracker
* Baby growth tracker

Thanks to the variety of functions, Piyo baby tracker makes postpartum life much easier. Whether it’s baby food or sleep, height, weight or medical conditions, the app will store baby nursing info as well as baby milestones month to month.

◆Built-in sharing function◆
Childcare info is shared immediately, so both parents can check on the baby's records anytime. On days when daddy is taking care of the baby while mommy is out, mommy can still have peace of mind by checking the baby eating tracker and milk amounts when daddy records them.

◆Record types◆
Nursing, Formula, Pumped breast milk, Baby food, Snacks, Poop, Pee, Sleep, Temperature, Height, Weight, Baths, Walks, Coughing, Rashes, Vomiting, Injuries, Medicine, Hospitals, and any other information you like, as well as a childcare diary (with photos)

◆Unique features◆
・Designed for easy, one-handed operation even while nursing, etc.
・Equipped with time bar function providing daily babycare summary at a glance
・Automatically aggregates and displays one-day amounts for nursing time, milk quantity, sleeping time, etc.
・Summarizes weekly variation in meals, sleep, bowel movements, and temperature in easily viewable graph
・Enables you to check how baby is growing with a baby growth chart
・Notifies you of the next nursing time: there is no way you can miss pumping, eating or pampers changing with Piyo baby feeding and diaper tracker.

It’s not easy to grow a baby. But having Piyo as a post pregnancy companion and newborn tracker makes parenting more organized and thus less stressful. Once you start keeping a child journal and log all developmental milestones, you’ll find how simple it’s to nurture your infant and share important details between parents.

Check the baby food tracker to see what your newborn eats at this particular stage and how s/he reacts to this food. Consult their nap tracker to find out when they need to sleep. Look through the pump log to know exactly when it’s time to get milk. Add your baby’s age, height, weight to the milestone tracker and observe the infant development week by week.

Create the best nursing routine with Piyo daily baby tracker! Accurate records = less stress = happy parenting. Track and grow a healthy baby!
summary: Breastfeeding, sleep, baby eating and diaper tracker. Baby growth milestones.

recentChanges: bug fix
comments: My wife and I have been loving the app for the past 3 months since our son was born. It's great for us both to be able to update the log from our own separate devices.

Very useful to track my baby's record, and the diary feature is a great option. I can look back the entries made on the first toughest days and really feel the growth of the baby which can otherwise be easily forgotten. The app allows my partner to partake in raising our baby first hand, share memories and understand emotional ups and downs.

Easy to use, love the breastfeeding timer so much! The growth chart is helpful and the little diary with photo option is such a nice feature. This app especially helped me during the newborn phase, but then was also great for tracking introducing solid foods etc.
Great app for parents! One of the most comprehensive baby tracking apps. Also super easy to use!

Great app with lots of capabilities and love the sync with partner option. Makes keeping a daily record of my newborn for his doctor. I just wish I could pick a custom alarm sound. The alarm sound is too loud and startles my baby.

title: Withings Health Mate
description:
Whether you’re looking to lose weight, get more active, monitor blood pressure, or even sleep better, Health Mate unleashes the power of Withings health devices, backed by a decade of expertise. In the app you’ll find health data that is easy to understand, personalized, and fully leverageable by you and your doctor. 

With Health Mate, be empowered to take action—and start mastering your vitals.

TRACK YOUR VITALS

WEIGHT & BODY COMPOSITION MONITORING
Reach your weight goals with advanced insights including weight, weight trends, BMI & body composition.

ACTIVITY & SPORT MONITORING
Automatically track your daily activity and workout sessions with in-depth insights including steps, heart rate, multisport tracking, connected GPS & Fitness Level assessment. 

SLEEP ANALYSIS / BREATHING DISTURBANCES DETECTION
Improve your nights with sleep-lab worthy results (sleep cycles, sleep score, heart rate, snoring & more) and uncover breathing disturbances.

HYPERTENSION MANAGEMENT
Monitor hypertension from the comfort of your home with medically-accurate systolic and diastolic blood pressure results, plus reports you can share with your doctor to monitor the efficacy of treatment.


...WITH A SIMPLE & SMART APP

EASY TO USE
Only one app for all Withings products for a holistic view of your health, in the palm of your hands. 

EASY TO UNDERSTAND
All the results are displayed clearly with normality ranges & color-coded feedback to know exactly where you stand. 

TAILORED HEALTH INSIGHTS
Knowing your data is good, but knowing how to interpret it is better. Health Mate has now a voice and will highlight particularly relevant data for your health and enrich your experience with a science-based interpretation of this data.

SHAREABLE REPORTS FOR YOUR DOCTORS
Easily share data with healthcare professionals including blood pressure, weight trends, temperatures & more. Get also access to a full health report that can be shared to your practician via PDF.

THE COMPANION TO Google Fit & YOUR FAVORITE APPS
Health Mate and Google Fit work seamlessly together, so you can retrieve all your health data in one place for easier health tracking.  Health Mate is also compatible with 100+ top health & fitness apps including Strava, MyFitnessPal and Runkeeper.


ABOUT WITHINGS

WITHINGS creates devices embedded in easy-to-use everyday objects that connect to a unique app and act as powerful daily health check-ups, as well as tools to help master long-term health goals. Our team of engineers, doctors, and health professionals invents the world’s most efficient devices to help track and analyze anyone’s vitals, via a decade of expertise.

comments: Installed this app on my Android phone then paired successfully with my new ScanWatch without problems. Then the app completely stopped working. Now all I get is the error message that it's not responding. Reinstalled the app twice no difference. Had to install it on my Android tablet (not ideal) but at least it now works. Great watch but not a very proficient app.

Doesn't sync with samsung galaxy watch for steps or heart rate. Cannot manually enter steps either. Primarily syncs with withings gear. So I only use it to track my weight with my withings scale. Also the scale is strange in that it can't do math. For example if you weigh 190 on Monday and 189.5 on Tuesday it will say you lost .4 pounds.

Can't connect Steel HR. Reinstalled the app, factory reset the watch but nothing. It searches for the watch but doesn't find it. Bluetooth is on, watch is active. It just doesn't connect. Edit: connected the watch to an iPhone which worked fine. Reset everything and tried again on my android (moto g6) and it worked. The watch is great, the app is fine. Wish it had more features and flexibility but it's fine.

Update: I made a new account Withings account with an Outlook email address. Changing from 1* to 2* since I can now at least try out the device. Original: Unable to login. I enter my gmail and password, hit login, and it progresses to a page asking for name, gender, etc. However I can't enter my name or gender because a new pop up shows asking if I want to login with Google or email. Can't back out of pop up. Trying to progress with Google or email again leads to app crashing.

Relevant information provided however inaccurate on linked apps like Samsung Health it does not transfer and record the data from the linked app efficiently or effectively. Misses between 200 to 300 steps, confuses workouts recorded and causes some workouts to be overriden in recording if you add your own workout. Needs some bugs like that fixed so it transfers and records accurate data from linked apps. Othereise I use it daily and like to see progression and results. Thanks.

title: WAAH - Baby Monitor, Baby Translator
description:
👶 WAAH is the best FREE baby monitor app using AI technology 👶



WAAH is a baby monitor app that accurately detects babies' cries and tells you why they're crying.

It is easy to use. All you need is a spare, old smartphone or tablet. No need to buy extra equipment.

(How to use: Download the app on two smartphones or tablets, connect both devices with a connection code, then place one of them next to the baby)



👶 What is special about baby monitor WAAH? 👶

🙆‍♀️ 🌎 WAAH is optimized for real-world environments. 
In a room, there may be various noises, including baby cries. Baby monitor WAAH can specifically classify baby cries from other noises at the world's highest level.

🧐 WAAH tells you why babies cry in 6 categories 
Are you frustrated that you don't know why your child is crying? No worries! Baby monitor WAAH interprets and classifies babies' cries into 6 categories: full diaper, hunger, burp, hugging, sleepiness, and other.

👪 WAAH is available anywhere, anytime 
As long as the Wi-Fi is connected, it can detect baby cries with no problem in any environment.

👨‍👩‍👧‍👧 All features are FREE!
Waah is completely free with unlimited use! 

🎻🌙Lullaby function is available to help the baby fall asleep



👶 How does WAAH bring you the best value? 👶 

🍼 It helps sleep-deprived parents take care of their children more conveniently.
Unlike the video monitor app that you have to keep watching, Baby monitor WAAH alerts you when your newborn baby wakes up and cries in the next room. You can also hear live sounds and soothe your baby through the device with the 'Walkie-Talkie' function without having to go there yourself.

🍼 You don't need to worry about waking up your newborn baby while doing house chores.
In the backyard, on other floors, no matter how far away you are, you can get smartphone notifications so that you can do smarter parenting.

🍼 Tell first-time parents why the baby is crying.
Was there a moment when you didn't know why your newborn baby was crying?
Baby monitor WAAH provides 6 categories of why babies cry: diapers, hunger, buff, hugging, sleepiness, and others.

🍼It helps hearing-impaired parents communicate freely with their babies.
Baby monitor WAAH provides visual representation of baby cry sound, so it doesn't matter if you have a hearing impairment. You will be notified through smartphone alerts as soon as your baby cries and why they're crying.



👶WAAH's Awards and Participation in Events 👶

2018.06 Facebook Korea startup accelerating program (Namsanlab)

2019.03 Google for Startups 2019

2019.05 Facebook global conference (F8) invited startups

2019.05 AI with Google 2019 speaker

2019.06 The Economist Seoul conference speaker

2020.01 CES 2020 exhibitor



We appreciate your feedback and always consider your reviews carefully! 


WAAH — Know when and why your baby "waahs!"



Note : Don't use "WAAH" to make decisions about health.

If you have any issues or suggestions, please contact us directly at [hello@waah.ai](mailto:hello@waah.ai)

Facebook: [https://www.facebook.com/Waah-107766330580807](https://www.facebook.com/Waah-107766330580807)

Website: [https://waah.ai](https://waah.ai/)

title: Baby Food
description:
In this Baby Food Recipes app, You can find healthy and Tasty recipes for Babies to make at home easy way. Babies will love to taste and eat these foods at nascent stage. Also these Baby Food recipes are easy to digest for Babies. 

Baby food is any soft, easily consumed food, other than breast milk or infant formula that is made specifically for babies, roughly between the ages of four to six months and two years. The food comes in multiple varieties and tastes; it may be table food that the rest of the family is eating that has been mashed or otherwise broken down, or it can be purchased ready-made from producers.

Making your own baby food doesn't have to be hard, and it's the best way to make sure your little one enjoys all the health benefits of fresh fruits and veggies.Get inspired with these easy-peasy homemade baby food ideas, featuring smooth purees sorted by age that are perfect for babies.

One of the most important things you can give your baby is a balanced, healthy diet. For the first few months, baby feeding is pretty straightforward because your little darling drinks her food, rather than eats it. But around 4 to 6 months of age, the next significant step in baby feeding takes place: eating solids.

For first-time parents, this can be a big deal, as you probably don't have a clue about what to feed your little one. Also, you may be worried about hygiene and all those food allergies that seem to be about these days.

Beside our homemade recipes for baby you will learn about starting to feed you baby and how to tell when he is ready for solid foods and also about food allergies ....

You don’t have to be a master in the kitchen to make your own baby food. While convenient, commercial baby foods lose vitamins and nutrients during processing and a lot of the “yumminess” that can make your baby excited to try new foods and combinations. These simple recipes are fast, inexpensive, and, best of all, more nutritious than foods that have been sitting on a grocery store shelf.

If you like Baby food recipes, do share it with Friends. Write a Feedback with Ratings.

title: BabyBoo : Growth, Development, Vaccination Tracker
description:
BabyBoo, built leveraging blockchain technology will be used to digitize vaccine cards. BabyBoo will be One Stop Solution for a parent, as it has everything related to baby health and development. The digital vaccine card will record the vaccination date, dosage, batch details, vaccine schedules, other data during the time of each vaccination. BabyBoo also provides information on each vaccine type to spread awareness about vaccines and clear any doubts that parents might have about the vaccine. Parents can set vaccine reminder for their child’s vaccinations and find a nearby health center, chat to doctors and schedule appointments through the app. Immunization is a very important task for the child’s health. Vaccinations now can be an easy task for new parents. BabyBoo app will also feature an integrated blockchain wallet where vaccine tokens are added after each vaccination. Each wallet has a globally unique wallet address that helps us to secure and decentralize the application.

BabyBoo will also provide growth and development tracker of a child so that parents can use it as a checklist to track their child’s growth and have their own growth chart. Also, every mother can have complete information about early nutrition of her baby. BabyBoo App will also support multiple languages and language agnostic designs in the near future to help improve adaptability. 

With BabyBoo, the parents can keep their young ones busy with our latest Entertainment Section which will help the kids engaged in fun activities. BabyBoo’s platform offers to keep your worries at bay by providing you and your child with a safe and secure entertainment/leisure environment. 

Young minds will tend to learn and develop things faster with the optimum use of technology, with our additional features of entertainment  with Rhymes, Stories, Cartoons, Learning videos & Lullabies.

It is user friendly and passionately crafted for parents which will help in coexisting with their professional and personal life with the assurance of content provided in the application and an advisable time limit. 



Additional features that we provide
============================
Digital Vaccine report- Easiest way to keep the vaccine cards secure. 
Developmental milestones- Know each and every step of your baby and their growth. This works as a child growth tracker and and growth checklist. 
Food milestones- Information about what and which type of food can be given to your baby at different ages. 
BabyBoo Store- Use this app and get a chance to get free gifts and buy goodies from our BabyBoo store
Reminders for Next Vaccines- BabyBoo app gives you periodic reminders about the next due vaccines. 
Easy communication with doctor- Have any doubts about your child’s health? Get in touch with the doctor through this app and get an answer to all your questions.
Save all your baby’s pictures, videos at one place- Did your baby crawl? Or did he/she take his/her first step? Click a picture, save it in your feed and share it with your family and friends.

title: Yumi Baby Food Recipes (Daily Update)
description:
"Yumi Baby Food Recipes" is a collection of the recipe for babies that can begin to be given to babies who are 6 months old. Giving food to babies on the sidelines of breast milk administration known as complementary feeding.

In this application, you can find a wide variety of baby food homemade recipes, DIY baby food, organic baby food, baby food pureed, baby nutrition, baby food for 6 months, baby food by age, etc.

Give exclusive breast milk until your baby is 6 months old so that your baby has a good immune system. After more than 6 months, you can add other nutrient intakes through complementary foods. This menu aims to make the baby begin to recognize the texture of food slowly. Let's look at this healthy and yumi baby food recipe!

Why use Yumi Baby Food Recipes?

★ Daily menu updates
★ The complete instructions for making baby food
★ Available recipe for babies from 6 to 9 months
★ Available recipe for babies from 9 to 12 months
★ Available recipe for babies from 12 to 24 months
★ Mark as Favorite
★ The menu can be shared
★ Quick access
★ Navigation is simple and easy to us


So what are you waiting for? Free download Yumi Baby Food Recipes and don't forget to share it with your friends!

----------------------------------------------------------------

We would love to hear from you! If you have any feedback, questions, or concerns, please contact us.

----------------------------------------------------------------

So what are you waiting for? Free download Yumi Baby Food Recipes and don't forget to share it with your friends!

title: ParentLove: Baby Tracker Feedings Diapers Pumping
description:
How To Track Your Baby’s Activities Without Losing Your Mind!😊🙏
Proven System By Thousands Of Parents!💪 ParentLove Baby Tracker

SIMPLE, YET POWERFUL
Get quick answers and always know when:
• Baby woke up
• Baby last ate
• Diaper last changed
and so much more!

EASY TO USE 
Passionately crafted by parents, ParentLove provides you with the simplest way to effortlessly record your baby's activities, from breastfeeding to tummy time sessions. Use the Glance summary, to help with estimating when baby is due for their next activity. Use the Journal to quickly review the most recent events to better understand your baby's routine. 

PRACTICAL & EFFICIENT 
Taylor ParentLove to satisfy your individual needs. Favorites give you quick access to the activities you need allowing you to record events quickly and easily in as little as 2 taps! The data you record for each activity, such as a reaction or a bottle’s content, can be customized to suit you and your baby's individual needs. Timers allow you to record breast feeding, pumping and sleeping sessions. 

STAY CONNECTED 
Sharing is a powerfully convenient way to stay connect with everyone caring for your baby. AutoSync ensures your data is securely stored in the ParentLove cloud and available to caregivers in real-time. Reports provide you with views into your baby’s trends and growth patterns enabling you to make informed decisions and better identify possible concerns.

The following are included FREE!

Activities Tracked:
• Breast Feeding
• Diaper Changes
• Bottle Feeding
• Naps & Overnight Sleeping with sleep interruptions!
• Breast Pumping Sessions
• Solid Food Feeding
• Tummy Time

Features:

• Custom Favorites
• Supports multiple children
• Daily Journal

• Activity Reports

The following are available for In-App Purchase

• Illness

comments: I love this app! It is user-friendly, intuitive, and beautifully designed. It has all of the features I want (tracking feeding and diapers, and the ability to share the profile so two people can enter and view activities) plus features I didn't know I wanted until I started using them (chronological "journal" of activities, as well as a 24-hour "glance" summary and bar graphs under "stats"). The creators responded quickly when I needed help learning how to share the profile. Overall excellent!

Having a preemie baby it was incredibly important that my husband and I keep very accurate and specific track of our daughter's habits. This app was perfect and had everything we needed in one place. It is also helpful that we both can have access to it to add things and make changes. We have been able to provide all the information doctors need to ensure correct development of our little. We are incredibly happy with it.

Amazing app! I have twins and this app makes it insanely easy to juggle back and forth and track EVERYTHING even when i pump i track that and can keep track of what i set back to freeze. You can even personalize this app too which helps switching back and forth that i don't accidentally log something under the wrong baby. You can personalize reminders, and i really can't say enough good things about this app, THANK YOU 💕

The perfect app for parents. I love that if my daughters doctor asks for certain stats I can immediately pull it up with this app. It is user-friendly and easy to use the Simplicity makes it so nice that even when you're exhausted after a long night of feeding you still can click and store all the information you need and one quick second

Great way to track my infants daily activities and be able to easily share it with my partner. The ease of use even when we are both tired from a midnight feeding makes the tracking much easier. The history function helps use build daily routines and shows us about what time we can expect the next feeding to be able to run errands in between.

title: Baby Sleep - White Noise
description:
Babies love white noise. They have spent 9 months in the quite loud womb so they are used to "noise". Background white noise is actually calming for your baby and resembles the kind of sounds that he would hear in the womb.

The app contains great selection of soothing white noise and lullabies. It has a simple timer that saves your battery. In addition to that it contains calming "shh-shhhh" sounds recorded by parents. The app does not require internet connection so you can use wherever you are.

Why to use white noise apps?

★ White noise reduces stress in babies
★ White noise helps babies to sleep
★ White noise helps babies to cry less
★ White noise will help YOU to sleep better

The app contains following sounds:

★ Rain ★ Forest ★ Ocean ★ Wind ★ River ★ Night ★ Fire ★ Heart ★ Car ★ Train ★ Plane ★ Washing machine ★ Vacuum cleaner ★ Clock ★ Fan ★ Radio ★ Hair dryer ★ Shower ★ White Noise ★ Brown Noise ★ Pink Noise ★ 4 gentle lullabies

Enjoy the app!

comments: Exactly what I need! A lightweight, simple app with a variety of sleep and soothing sounds. We use it all night and every nap time for my son. We co-sleep part the night so I put it on in both our rooms, and I'm sleeping much better myself now that I'm not being woken up as much by random noises. I think I'll sleep with white noise on for myself indefinitely! It's great.

No good with ads. Often the noise stops by itself or starts pausing. Currently the brown noise goes on for 2 minutes then goes off. Trying to re-install to see if that helps matters. Used to be brilliant but now pop up ads come up which startle baby or stop sounds. Quite annoying as app itself is good

The ads are too loud in the free version! The reason we use this app is to calm down the baby. But suddenly ads pop up and wake up the baby completely. We understand it is a free version and ads are necessary but they could be at least without sound.

Adds pop up when you need to turn on/off the music. The baby loves sleeping with this music but after he falls asleep adds with sound wakes him up. You have to wait a lot of seconds before using the app. You can"t switch it off by closing all apps because it runs in the background. The price is very high for switching off the apps. Too bad. It was my favorite before this. Now I have to uninstall it and find another one.

I've used this app with both my kids and its been great. But the recent introduction of ads with sound is completely ridiculous! I'm trying to get my baby to sleep and change the white noise type and get a ridiculous loud ad that wakes her up! It completely defeats the object of an app to help with sleep. I'm uninstalling and will use another.

title: BabyBook Journal - Baby Tracker & Newborn Diary
description:
A great newborn tracking app is an essential tool for new mothers and new fathers who want to monitor their baby newborn and improve parenthood. BabyBook is a smart infant journal app that allows you to track baby's activities and to discover correlations between your actions and your child's growth / health / mood. Keeping a daily journal (baby diary), you will be able to track breastfeeding, pumping, diapering, and every other aspect of your child's life. It has been designed to help you manage tiredness, stress, and develop positive nursing habits: it's a perfect parenting assistant always in your pocket. Are you striving for a perfect and easy-to-use new-born tracker or a child notes taker? With this child journal you can easily analyse and track behaviours to keep track of everything and also discover patterns. The best baby logbook among baby apps and newborn apps.
 
 What can you track?
You can easily track any aspect of your baby's life: the app is already set up with the major elements that you need to record: bottle-feeding (milk / formula), breast-feeding (left / right), pumping, solid meals, bath time, diapers (pampers) change, pee, poo, medications, fever, vaccination, height, weight, head circumference, crawling, crying, night awakenings, outdoor time, tummy time, playing time, sleeping. You will also find a parents section, where you can track your happiness, stress, and any aspect of the relationship with your partner. If this is not enough, you can add infinite custom events that you want to log, related to your infant, or to the parenthood. 

 Features:
 - Calendar event tracker: Track nursing activities, record medical symptoms, log your infant sprout, check daily routines, track moods and keep a daily diary of your baby all in one place. 
 - Statistics: monitor symptoms frequency, and take care of your little son: is he or she feeling sick very often? How long since last breastfeeding? Is your child sprout on track? Are you developing good new mommy habits? Are you too stressed as new parents? Everything is under control.
 - Correlation analysis: discover what makes your baby cry that often, and how you can change habits to improve. Learn what makes he or she sleep better, and improve your infant sleeping quality.
 - Export data: export your child log / baby journal, save it or share it as a csv file.
 - Develop good habits: when you track activities and you discover that they help you and your son to feel better, go for it! Improve your feeding management, understand your son's sleeping habits and live a better life as a mom / dad.
 
Attention: BabyBook is just one of the many baby apps on the store. It does not substitute doctor visits, and it does not provide a professional diagnosis for your baby's symptoms. However, it can help you and your doctor to track activities and better understand your child.
descriptionHTML:
A great newborn tracking app is an essential tool for new mothers and new fathers who want to monitor their baby newborn and improve parenthood. BabyBook is a smart infant journal app that allows you to track baby's activities and to discover correlations between your actions and your child's growth / health / mood. Keeping a daily journal (baby diary), you will be able to track breastfeeding, pumping, diapering, and every other aspect of your child's life. It has been designed to help you manage tiredness, stress, and develop positive nursing habits: it's a perfect parenting assistant always in your pocket. Are you striving for a perfect and easy-to-use new-born tracker or a child notes taker? With this child journal you can easily analyse and track behaviours to keep track of everything and also discover patterns. The best baby logbook among baby apps and newborn apps.

What can you track?
You can easily track any aspect of your baby's life: the app is already set up with the major elements that you need to record: bottle-feeding (milk / formula), breast-feeding (left / right), pumping, solid meals, bath time, diapers (pampers) change, pee, poo, medications, fever, vaccination, height, weight, head circumference, crawling, crying, night awakenings, outdoor time, tummy time, playing time, sleeping. You will also find a parents section, where you can track your happiness, stress, and any aspect of the relationship with your partner. If this is not enough, you can add infinite custom events that you want to log, related to your infant, or to the parenthood.

Features:
- Calendar event tracker: Track nursing activities, record medical symptoms, log your infant sprout, check daily routines, track moods and keep a daily diary of your baby all in one place.
- Statistics: monitor symptoms frequency, and take care of your little son: is he or she feeling sick very often? How long since last breastfeeding? Is your child sprout on track? Are you developing good new mommy habits? Are you too stressed as new parents? Everything is under control.
- Correlation analysis: discover what makes your baby cry that often, and how you can change habits to improve. Learn what makes he or she sleep better, and improve your infant sleeping quality.
- Export data: export your child log / baby journal, save it or share it as a csv file.
- Develop good habits: when you track activities and you discover that they help you and your son to feel better, go for it! Improve your feeding management, understand your son's sleeping habits and live a better life as a mom / dad.

Attention: BabyBook is just one of the many baby apps on the store. It does not substitute doctor visits, and it does not provide a professional diagnosis for your baby's symptoms. However, it can help you and your doctor to track activities and better understand your child.

recentChanges: The personal assistant for smart parents
comments: Not perfect but what is? Very helpful once you get used to it. People complain about minor stuff rather than qualify performance. Keep it going and thanks.

Looks like a pretty good app, though its hard to figure out how to edit items as easily as it describes. Also, i dont like having to go back and delete the extra letters it creates when i try to type. Example: typing the word has turns out like hhahas. Lastly, i wish you had an option for the first day the baby is born as i had gotten this before i was due. When my son came, it was hard to use it the way its intended.

Not customizable enough. Also not inclusive! Only allows options for "mom and dad", no options for lgbtq or single parents... I also wasn't a fan of the fact that you have to imput time along with an entry, for example, cutting baby's nails: why must I put exactly long it took? Its not necessary at all and only complicates things. I understand for pumping, but for baby care? Its just something that bugs me slightly considering its a paid app. Overall, just wish for more customization...

It's really helpful, now I can keep tracking my baby activities, check stats weekly, monthly. Just wonder if this app has a feature like back up the data to cloud such as gg drive, one drive, so I can recover my data if something accidentally happen to my phone.

Decent app - still early days using it but i like the wide range of things u can track. One error I feel- in the quick insights bit, there is no report for "Total daily sum of the feed", so i can see how much the baby has had so far today. Also, the holy grail would be to have an app where both mum and dad can update and sync from different phones.

title: Mozart for Babies Brain Development Lullabies
description:
Lullabies Baby Mozart App is a free offline application which helps your baby to fall asleep faster.

The app contains the most beautiful and popular Mozart's lullabies Brain Development selection:

Why to download our free Baby Lullabies Sleep Music App:

– High quality sound
– The application can run offline
– Timer function (select a lullaby, set the timer, after a present time lullaby turn off itself)
– Slideshow function
– Easy to use interface
– Night mode (light ON/OFF)
– Beautiful graphics
– Absolutely relaxing music

Why lullabies are great for babies:

Lullaby music benefits child development in a variety of ways. Playing soft lullabies with baby relaxing music at bedtime promotes comfort, quality sleep and brain development.
Put Lullabies with soft Classical Music on at a low volume overnight or during naps to provide your youngster with all the benefits music has to offer your sleeping baby.

Mozart for Babies:

Playing soft music of Mozart for Babies as a background music before bed or during naps improves sleep duration and quality.
Baby Mozart calms the nervous system and support healthy brain functioning.

Lullabies can help babies and toddlers feel safe, relaxed and calm, while music during naps can help energy levels decrease and encourage the body to prepare for sleep naturally.

Mozart's Lullabies playlist:

– Twinkle Twinkle Little Star
– Piano Sonata No.11 Alla Turca
– Wiegenlied (Lullaby)
– Adagio for Violin & Orchestra
– Eine Kleine Nachtmusik
– Le Nozze di Figaro
– Symphony No.27 Andante
– Flute and Harp Concerto
– Flute Quartet
– Brahms' Lullaby 
– Bassoon Concerto
– Clarinet Concerto
– Horn Concerto No.3
– Symphony No.37 Andante
– Violin Sonata No.17

comments: I absolutely love this classical music for putting my toddler to sleep. I find myself listening to them to fall asleep as well. Unfortunately it will just stop playing for no reason. Even the timer won't stop it from cutting off at will. Can anyone help me with this issue?

I LOVE this app! I can play relaxing classical music for my baby and not have to have to app open for it to continue to play so the light from the screen won't be an issue. The only thing I'd like to see is more classical music for longer listening segments. Sometimes she takes longer to settle down than other nights.

Wonderful app with BEAUTIFUL SONGS that really soothes my little man! I can't tell you how many peaceful nights (and even afternoons or mornings) this app has afforded me! The only small issue is ai would like to be able to choose the order of songs from this song list, that I could have all the songs from both (or all) apps for my purchase price (which is reasonable) and also that there were a couple more customization options. Hope you decide to add some of the songs from the other app.

Beautiful music, so relaxing. Turned fraught nap time battles into a bonding experience with my baby. He's grown up with it for the past year now and heads up to his bedroom as soon as I start playing it. Love this app.
Absolutely excellent 👍👍👍. It works for my son and his dad. lol. Am not left out also. It a great and amazing app. But the song are just 10.

title: Breastfeeding Newborn tracker, pump and baby diary
descriptionHTML:
The simplest program to track breastfeeding, pumping, bottle feeding, solid food consumption, diapers, sleep schedule, height and weight, and more.

With the click of a button your feedings and baby care history will be stored in the app. You will have an easy-to-maintain history of your baby’s growth.

In the application, you can share baby's data with your partner, relatives, or nanny. Syncing data between multiple devices is available for free.

The birth of a baby is a miracle that fills your heart with joy! A mother’s life changes dramatically with the birth of her baby. It is so important for a mother and her newborn baby to establish a comfortable breastfeeding relationship. Moms need to keep track of which breast to offer her baby, how long the baby suckles at each breast, the number of times the baby breastfeeds each day, how many wet diapers and bowel movements the baby has, how long and frequently the baby sleeps, as well as the baby’s weight and growth. All of this information is important for the self-assessment of breastfeeding and for assessing the growth of the child. Having this information easily accessible will be extremely useful when visiting with your pediatrician or lactation consultant.

It is important to record all of this data. Do not rely on your memory, because even the most organized mothers are often lost in the sea of information about their newborn.

Use the features of the Breastfeeding application.

Breastfeeding and pumping:
- record the time and quantity of feedings and / or pumpings;
- note which breast was fed or pumped last to ensure starting new feeding/pumping on the opposite breast;
- record the duration of feeding / pumping;
- pause feeding / pumping, if necessary;
- brief feedings / pumpings, or those that occur within a short period of time, are grouped into one feeding / pumping event
- quickly add feeding / pumping session that was similar to the most recent but update with current time
- use the maximum duration of feeding setting and the application will stop recording the feeding / pumping at the set time if you are unable to press stop

Liquids:
- consider all of your child’s fluid intake (water, expressed breast milk, formula, juice, etc.);
-track your child’s reactions to new fluids and leave comments for yourself and other caregivers;
- set the default fluid volume (can be edited as needed);

Feeding (solid food):
- add solid foods as your child begins eating them (cereal, vegetables, fruits, meat, fish);
- track your child’s reactions to these new foods and leave comments for yourself and other caregivers
- set the default fluid volume (can be edited as needed);

Sleep:
- record the time and duration of your baby’s sleep each day so you can better plan your day;
- compare your baby’s sleep habits with recommended sleep guidelines


Diapers:
- track the number of your baby’s wet and / or dirty diapers. This information is crucial for noticing signs of dehydration, constipation, and diarrhea and alerting the child’s pediatrician if necessary.

Measurements:
- track height and weight to evaluate your baby’s development;

Other features:
- edit or delete events as needed;
- set reminders for various events;
- use the application in your native language (more than 40 languages available);
- select your preferred units of measurement (ounces or milliliters);
- browse graphs;
- view statistics;
- enter data for several children and twins;
- backup all of your data;
and more!

PRO-version
- disable advertising;
- install widgets for quick viewing and launch;
- auto backup every 24 hours;
- export to Excel


We are constantly working to improve the application. Write to us with questions and suggestions.

Enjoy watching your healthy baby grow!

Want to receive the latest news about the application? Subscribe to the news group at https://www.facebook.com/WhisperArts
summary: Do you sometimes forget which breast was last? Try the powerful tracking app!

title: My Baby Food - Cooking Game
description:
Learn how to make simple and tasty snacks for lovely babies. Develop your babysitting and cooking skills by keeping them happy and fed. Let’s start with baby food creations!

Babies have become hungry after playing joyful games in the interactive playroom. As their best babysitter take good care of them by preparing nutritious and delicious healthy snacks. Follow the recipe and learn how to make tasty soup, powdered milk or smoothie for the little ones. 

Powdered milk:
Enjoy playing the “plumber” puzzle mini game. Connect all the pipes correctly to get water, then choose baby's favorite flavor. You can select between classic, vanilla, strawberry, chocolate, caramel and berry. Shake the bottle and feed the baby with a quickly prepared and tasteful meal.

Smoothie:
Fruit is nature's candy! To make a perfect smoothie, you have to shake the tree and pick fruits in the fun “catcher” mini game. Add fruits and milk to the blender, then feed your hungry child with a cherry, plum, orange, apple, peach or pear smoothie.

Soup:
Everybody loves scrumptious homemade soup. Play the mini-game to harvest vegetables while avoiding earthworms. Choose the right vegetable from your garden and make carrot, tomato, cauliflower, pumpkin, potato or eggplant soup. Don't forget to add some aromatic spices!

Kids are waiting for your yummy snacks! Therefore, use your cooking skills and have fun playing this food maker game!

Features:
• cooking adventure for kids
• fun-packed mini-games
• over 20 fruits, vegetables, spices and milk flavors
• cooking recipes with images
• interactive playroom
• friendly HD graphics with vivid and shiny colors

This game is free to play but certain in-game items and features, also some of those mentioned in game description, may require payment via in-app purchases which cost real money. Please check your device settings for more detailed options regarding in-app purchases.
The game contains advertising for Bubadu’s products or some third parties which will redirect users to our or third-party site or app.

Privacy policy: https://bubadu.com/privacy-policy.shtml
Terms of service: https://bubadu.com/tos.shtml

title: Mother, Baby & Child
description:
The newest and hippest parenting & child magazine officially embarks on its frontier. Mother, Baby & Child aims to be the credible source of information backed up by doctors and statistics in every article. Its mission is to inform new mothers with original and informative sources.
CPI has been in the industry for over 20 years. Under its wing are leading titles in business-to-business and consumer publications such as BBC Good Food, OK! Middle East and more than 20 others. Ever growing, Mother, Baby & Child is yet another addition focusing to a rather different niche: parenting and children.
Darine Williams is the founder of Mother, Baby & Child magazine. In a matter of months, this ‘brainchild’ of hers has grown eyes to see the world, hands and feet to explore and wings to spread the joys of motherhood.
Mother, Baby & Child magazine focuses on Pre-Conception, Pregnancy, New Family, Birth, Toddler, Infant and Motherhood. It aspires to offer women useful and original pieces that they cannot find anywhere else. Mothers are given their much deserved attention with fashion, inspirational, health & wellbeing segments among others. The magazine encourages readers by featuring mother entrepreneurs, charity workers and women environmentalists. It also makes motherhood fun with its interactive competition and voucher pages both in the magazine and social media.
Eventually, Mother, Baby & Child will go to the next level – published in Arabic and to be distributed across the GCC.

title: theAsianparent: Track Pregnancy & Count Baby Kicks
description:
Enjoy your pregnancy and parenting journey with our Asian parents community.

All parents, especially pregnant women, can use theAsianparent to find credible information from our experienced parenting community. Many questions, from nutrition to fetal development to growth, can be difficult to answer for new parents. theAsianparent’s pregnancy and baby development app can help you along the way.

Our pregnancy tracker helps you ensure a happy and healthy pregnancy while the parent community helps you through every step. From the meaning of baby’s name to health to food guides, our community supports parents and parents-to-be.

Find what activities, food, and medicines are safe for pregnant women, and everything you need for your growing baby. Guides and articles on theAsianparent provide expert, curated advices on everything from pregnancy to food choices.

theAsianparent community believes in a healthy pregnancy to parenting experience, that every parent should have access to scientifically accurate information, and in the collective wisdom of millions of parents.

theAsianparent features:

👪SUPPORTIVE PARENTING COMMUNITY 💏
-  Ask your concerns about pregnancy & baby care, breastfeeding, ovulation, baby’s feeding schedule and more. Get the answers for other experienced parents within minutes!
- Share your parenting journey  to the community. Guide and help a fellow parent based on your own experiences.

👶TRACKING PREGNANCY & BABY DEVELOPMENT 🤰
- Pregnancy tracker to ensure a healthy, happy pregnancy.
- Pregnancy calendar so you’ll know what to expect day by day until due date - the aches and pains as well as the joys like experiencing baby’s first kick!
- Baby tracker to track his/her growth and milestones day-by-day until age 7.

🥘FIND OUT SAFE FOOD & DELICIOUS RECIPES🥛
- Safe food for pregnant women, nursing mothers, postpartum, or for babies and children.
- Make sure nutrition needs are being met from foods that are safe for pregnant women and children under 5.
- Find out delicious recipes that are suitable for pregnancy, postpartum, and breastfeeding. You start weaning your baby? We have many weaning food recipes ready for you!

🤰SUPPORTING HEALTHY PREGNANCY👣
- Keep a track of your baby's movements and record it with our new baby kick counter.
- Having 3 sessions of kick counting a day is advised to know your baby's activeness & health.
- Had a miscarriage or stillbirth? We got your back, Mothers, supporting you with our healing mode.

📖 FAMILY & PARENTING ARTICLES 📱
- Parenting articles full of useful tips, based on the most advanced parenting research, to make life easier.
- Nutrition guides, expertly crafted scientific parenting advice and what’s happening around you - we cover it all.
- All motherhood needs in the most amazing feed of articles that will keep you engaged for hours.
- Baby guides and articles for each month of your baby’s development, so you can stay informed about milestones, diet, activities, vaccinations, as well as red flags.

📷 BABY PHOTOS, MUSIC & MORE 📲
- Share photos in a parent network, away from the nagging eyes of your frenemies!
- Add stickers & frames to your photos and share to your loved ones!
- Enjoy informative videos and popular songs that you can play in background with your little one!
- More kid-safe videos here help parents avoid the danger of other video streaming services.

🎉JOIN CONTESTS & WIN GREAT PRIZES! 🙌
- Parenting should be rewarding, that’s why you can win really cool gifts on our app.
- Contests and giveaways with practical and awesome gifts like strollers, staycations, and much more!
- Join many exciting games held within the community. Grab the prizes & enjoy your parenting journey in more fun way.

Download theAsianparent app today and be a part of the largest parenting community of Asian Parents in the world.

recentChanges:
Dear parents, we have 3 exciting updates for you:

1.Give our freshly-baked “Recipe feature” a try. Suggestions and tags will tell you if the dish is made for children or safe for mums-to-be.

2.Wish you could peek inside mummy’s tummy to see your baby? Now you can! Our exciting 3D feature will give you a surreal experience of how your little one is growing in your bump!

3.Too tired to type? With our new voice-to-text feature, you can now search the content of our app with your voice!
comments: This app is very helpful. But I'm just disappointed with the new update. When I didn't updated this app I can view the week by week pregnancy tracker even without an internet. But right now, you need to have internet first inorder for you to view or track your week by week pregnancy. I don't have internet sometimes, so now I can't track my week by week pregnancy. So it's like this app suddenly became useless for me.

I had been using the app for a while now and it's all good until I had redeemed my points for some vouchers but have yet to receive any emails or notifications on how to use the redeemed vouchers. Points have been deducted but I'm not able to use the vouchers I've redeemed, and worst there's a 3mth limit for the vouchers before it expire. I've emailed multiple times regarding this but no response. I really hope someone can help me with this as I am really interested to use the vouchers.

I really love this app. It helps me a lot for bringing up my children. It used as a guide for me each day and aside from that I learn also to other moms experience. Thank you for establishing this app. God Bless.

It's been three months since I started using this app, and it's been very helpful! I've received more information about pregnancy than I originally looked for, most of the time. The only issue is that the dashboard doesn't seem to regularly update itself properly.
Very good app.. Really helps to understand the points from other parents too.. And I love the how baby explains how born he or she is.

title: Pregnancy, childbirth, child development, mother.
description:
Are you looking for a professional childbirth app to get advice from specialists in pregnancy? Do you want a powerful app that can let you learn everything about birthing? Welcome to the parent application "Pregnancy, childbirth, child development, mother" by week! All about child development and childbirth are ready for you now!

"Pregnancy, childbirth, child development" is one of the best apps for future mothers, with amazing functionalities and good interaction design. It provides detailed information about pregnancy including: how the pregnancy develops by the week, possible risks, pregnancy management, recommendations and advice to future mothers, the most important childbirth questions and the most accurate answers to them. Join our new childbirth calendar app, and get to know the most important thing about child development.

Discover our new expecting baby app, and never miss any further information. It has various features that will enhance your experience. You can explore the detailed pregnancy calendar including pregnancy for weeks with photos and videos from 1 week of to 42 weeks, symptoms and stages, health, labor, and diet for an amazing experience. You won’t regret downloading our child development and pedagogy app.

How to determine the week of pregnancy? - This issue occurs among newly-pregnant women one of the first. Especially if this is the first pregnancy, then with the definition of terms, there can be a lot of confusion. A gynecologist calls you one term, an ultrasound specialist can determine a little different, and you know for sure that they do not coincide with the present. And why does such a discrepancy arise every time? We will help you to understand this simple but important issue. More or less accurately, knowing the present term of pregnancy is necessary in order to understand what processes occur with the organisms of the future mother and child, and on the basis of these data, doctors will make their conclusions about the norms of pregnancy development. The gestation period can be gestational and obstetric, between which there is always a difference of two weeks. In addition, often the medical calculations do not coincide with reality, which also has various explanations.

In the section Development of pregnancy by week, you will learn how with each next week of pregnancy there will be tremendous changes! Many of them will be visible to the eyes of others, you will only be able to feel some of them "on your own skin," but the most important, the most mysterious and incomprehensible processes are hidden for all ... Scientists have been observing the birth and development of a new life for many centuries, but still cannot comprehend all of its secrets and do not stop marveling at the great miracle! To lead a pregnancy for weeks will be your doctor to observe the norms of the development of the baby and for the well-being of your health for the entire term. The same thing is useful for the future mother herself: you will not only understand at what stage of development your child is in a particular week of childbearing but also be able to ask the doctor questions you are interested in your own well-being. Obstetricians say that the average pregnancy lasts 40 weeks. But most births occur between 38 and 42 weeks. Also, there is an opportunity set up the contractions counter.

In our appendix, we have singled out a separate chapter on the upbringing of children. In it, you will find a lot of practical advice from doctors, obstetricians, pediatricians, and psychologists. We will tell everything about the pros and cons of finding a child in a kindergarten. All the intricacies of vaccinations, which exist for and against. Allergy types before school age and older.

- Children under 3 years old
- Children 3-7 years old
- Children older than

Be healthy and healthy for your family!
