JOHNSON’S® BEDTIME™ Baby Sleep App answers your sleep-related questions, gives advice and helps you track and learn about your baby’s sleep habits. And in the long run, get more rest yourself!

Having a new baby affects your sleep, there’s no doubt about it. About 25-30% of infants and toddlers have sleep difficulties. Now there is help. Using JOHNSON’S® BEDTIME™ Baby Sleep App is easy as 1-2-3. In an instant you will have access to our panel of sleep analysts, including our Baby Sleep Expert Dr. Jodi Mindell, who will answer your sleep-related questions. You’ll also find our 3-step nighttime routine, the only one that has been clinically proven to help baby fall asleep faster and sleep through the night better.

The JOHNSON’S® BEDTIME™ Baby Sleep App includes:
- Sleep Log to track baby’s sleep sessions and to share with others caring for your baby.
- 3-Step nighttime routine with instructive videos and step-by-step advice.
- Access to our panel of sleep analysts, including our Sleep Expert Dr. Jodi Mindell, who will answer your sleep-related questions.
- Customize your sleep routine and sleep routine reminders.
- Lullabies and Ambient Sounds to help soothe your baby to sleep.
- Ability to create and customize your own baby sleep routine
- Child’s Sleep Analysis & Sleep Score with custom recommendations
- Lullaby Baby Sleep Playlists
- Sleep timer for Ambient Sounds / White noise
- Updated FAQ set for Sleep Expert Questions
- New charts for baby’s Sleep Log tracking

We continuously work to improve the JOHNSON’S® BEDTIME™ Baby Sleep App to create a better sleep tool for parents.

Here’s to helping you get better sleep for you and your baby!
summary: Babies sleep better!  Ask a sleep expert, lullabies, white noise, logs, routine.
recentChanges: maintenance release
comments: I'm really bummed. We have been using this app for a little over a month now and it has helped me immensely to understand my baby's sleeping patterns. Apparently the app is not compatible with the Notes, however, because since upgrading phones, the app won't open anymore. I've restarted my phone, un-installed and re-installed the app and I am not able to get it open without it crashing :/
Blessed to have it. I have been using it since my daughter was born 3 years ago and now use it with my son.
Won't even let me sign in. I even tried making a new account but it just says I already have an account.
My baby was OUT like a light. This app rocks :)
Both kids love the music and it's great at getting them to sleep. ❤️

title: Growth Charts UK-WHO
description:
Growth Charts UK-WHO uses UK-specific growth chart data to help paediatricians and health professionals calculate weight, length, head circumference and BMI growth centiles for babies, infants and children. This app performs one-off calculations and does not store historical data.

Growth centile calculations are often prone to error with paper charts, and this app aims to make this process quicker and more reliable.

Data used in this app has been provided by the Royal College of Paediatrics and Child Health (RCPCH), and is a combination of the Neonatal and Infant Close Monitoring Growth Chart (NICM), the UK WHO 0-4 years growth chart, and the RCPCH UK Growth chart (2-18).
descriptionHTML:
Growth Charts UK-WHO uses UK-specific growth chart data to help paediatricians and health professionals calculate weight, length, head circumference and BMI growth centiles for babies, infants and children. This app performs one-off calculations and does not store historical data.

Growth centile calculations are often prone to error with paper charts, and this app aims to make this process quicker and more reliable.

Data used in this app has been provided by the Royal College of Paediatrics and Child Health (RCPCH), and is a combination of the Neonatal and Infant Close Monitoring Growth Chart (NICM), the UK WHO 0-4 years growth chart, and the RCPCH UK Growth chart (2-18).
summary: Calculate one-off growth centiles for children using UK-WHO data from the RCPCH.
recentChanges:
Faster and slicker interface. Lots of bug fixes and improvements.
Major changes:
- Added BMI centile calculator.
- Added head circumference centiles > 2 years old.
- Graphing is now plotted on a z-score scale (rather than probability), so that centile lines at the extremities are equally spaced out.
- Now displays both z-scores and centiles for the research people out there.
- Age is now also displayed in weeks until 1 year of age (to make it easier to plot on Red Book paper growth charts).
comments: Outstandingly clean and reliable app for clinicians who just need a point assessment of a patient's growth. As other reviews have stated though, probably not the best for anyone wanting to track their child's growth over time and see trends.

Reliable but with some problems. The app is very reliable and easy to use but it has a lot of shortcomings. Basically the fact that it does not show the measurements on a chart and that it does not allow you to store multiple measurements of multiple patients. It also seems like the development has stopped since it was last updated in 2017.

This app has a lot of negative reviews as it doesn't store data or create a growth chart. These negative reviews are unfair as the description clearly states "Calculate one-off growth centiles for children using UK-WHO data from the RCPCH." As a health visitor I use this app to calculate ONE OFF growth centiles before plotting it in the "red book" or documenting it in the patient record. It's especially good if there are any concerns about infant growth as it gives the centiles range and the exact centile, so small changes can be seen. It also gives the age in days and gestational age. It could be improved by the addition of the age in weeks too.
reliable app. I use it regularly in an outpatient setting.
Practical and easy to use. It would be nice if it can produce charts.

title: Baby Care and Make Up
description:
If you ever wondered how is like to look after a baby this baby game might give you an idea about it because you’ll be assign to take care of a cute little girl who needs an immediately bath and of course the following actions that comes along with the process. To be able to reach the dress up part you have to make sure you accomplish all the steps from the previous phase: the treatment. First you have to check out if her hair needs a haircut and if so you have to do it right away. Once you are done put on the hat to protect her eyes from the water drops and the shampoo. Wet her hair and add some conditioner to smooth her scalp then rub it for few minutes because it’ll confer a fresh and shiny look. Wash her up and then dry her hair, right after that unravel it. 

You have the opportunity to choose a natural make up for this little baby girl and maybe you might want to add some sparkling details to it. The blush is a must have and you’ll be able to put it on the one you think it fits better. You could also choose the color of her eyes, the lipstick you take and the outfit she’ll be wearing. Take a pretty colorful dress and don’t forget to add the accessories that will make her stand out in the playground. It’s your choice and if you want to could also give her a cute necklace, a pair of earrings, a hair accessory, you could even add a face tattoo for kids. Ensure yourself before you finish that the look you confer her is the one you enjoy the most, if not you could make some changes and find the one you really believe is the best.

as well as his or her weeks, months, and memorable dates every day 
just by registering your child's birthday or due date.

With the status bar and widget tools, you can check everything without running the app, and our notifications will help you always remember important dates.

title: Homemade Baby Food Recipes
description:
In early childhood eating habits & tastes are formed for life. Babies grow more rapidly in their first year that at any other time and you have this window of opportunity between 6 and 12 months where you can develop your baby’s taste buds. This is the time to introduce an array of different flavours and textures. Meat, chicken and fish are an important part of a baby’s journey in their first year. If you bring up your child on a variety of fresh food from the start, the transition to family meals will be much easier. Miss this crucial time and your child may join the ranks of picky eaters.

Why make homemade baby food?
You don’t have to be a master in the kitchen to make your own baby food.

While convenient, commercial baby foods may lose vitamins and nutrients during processing, as well as the “yumminess” that can make your baby excited to try new foods and combinations.

The recipes we show in the app are fast, inexpensive, and — best of all — could be more nutritious than foods that have been sitting on a grocery store shelf.

Things to keep in mind before making baby food

1.- Making your own baby food is easy, fast, and saves money.
2.- Second and foremost, make sure your baby is ready for solid foods.
3.- Choose organic produce whenever possible.

title: CDC Vaccine Schedules
description:
Quick access from CDC to ACIP-recommended immunization schedules, complete with footnotes. Intended for healthcare professionals recommending and administering vaccines to infants, children, adolescents, and adults. 
This app is one of an expanding collection of applications from CDC on a variety of specific topics, each optimized for your mobile device. When your device is connected, content is automatically updated so you have the most up-to-date information.
This tool provides:
•	Child and adolescent schedules, with immunization recommendations from birth through age 18
•	Adult schedule, listing recommended vaccines for adults by age group and by medical conditions 
•	Contraindications and precautions table, with footnotes applying to schedules
Features include
•	Color coding coordinates with printed schedules 
•	Hyperlinked vaccine name opens pop-up with dose specifics
•	Catch-up schedule for children 4 months through 18 years shows minimum dosing interval 
•	Related vaccine resources and websites
Automatic updates

title: Baby Phone for Kids - Learning Numbers and Animals
description:
Baby Phone - Numbers, Animals is one of our learning and entertaining games for kids. The baby phone number animals helps parents turn an ordinary smartphone into a toy phone for babies. The animal phone game provides both kids entertainment and education. The young player will get acquainted with various wild and domestic animals for kids and animal sounds for babies, as well as learn numbers
Killer features of our baby phone app free:
• Playing this baby first play phone your kid can explore 11 animals and hear the sounds they produce. In our baby telephone your kid will find a horse, a goat, a dog, a cat, a chicken, a mouse, a cow, a pig, a duck and a sheep. All the animals in our baby animal phone are presented by funny pictures. Contact with the animals of the children phone helps develop communication skills and curiosity.
• There is an ability to pretend phone calls for kids - the most exciting part of the animal phone when your baby calls a certain animal and it answers! I The presentation of the sounds of our learning animal games for kids in the form of a toddler phone call will give a greater effect than a simple explanation.
• Learning numbers for preschoolers from 0 to 9.
• Like in all musical games for kids there are songs and music melodies in our kids phone app. The babyphone game will develop your toddler’s musical ear. Your baby will love to play phone for kids.
• Little kids can play phone for kids call in several widespread languages - English, Spanish, Russian and some others. So, our baby cell phone app gives an opportunity to learn animals and numbers not only in the native language, but in foreign languages as well. Such educational games for kids baby phone 3 4 years will be especially useful for those children who are going to study languages in the future.
• The baby mobile game is really simple, fun and interactive. Even the smallest kids will be able to play baby animal games on their own.
• All our educational games for kids kindergarten are free to download, including this baby mobile phone.
Our kids phone games can be recommended as:
- learning games for toddlers age 2;
- learning games for toddlers age 3;
- free learning games for kids 3 to 4 years old;
- learning games for 4 year olds (kids learning games free for a 4 year old);
- learning games for kids 5 years of age
How to play our educational games for kids nursery in which baby learn animals:
- Call up an animal - make a fake phone call for baby. To play phone baby first, hit the call button to see a full list of the animals in the phone book. The kid touches any picture and the animal takes the call on the baby cell phone within a few seconds. 
- Play with buttons and learn numbers for toddlers - 123 learning numbers. This mini-game of the baby phone for kids focuses a child’s attention on the buttons shown on the screen. When the 123 games for kids free begins, one of the buttons starts tilting. The task of this part of babyphone mobile is to hit the wobbling one to score
- Take calls from the animals playing the animals phone. Now and then, your kid will receive calls from animal friends thanks to baby mobile with sound and lights! The baby mode for your phone is automatically programmed to send calls to your phone so that your kid can answer them and hear animal sounds for kids learning free.
Featuring a toy phone for kids with a lively and colorful interface, this phone game with real phone calls for kids free app will be a great helper in learning animals for kids, animal voices for kids and numbers for toddlers free!
The creation of our educational games for kids Baby Phone involved child specialists all focused to create a game that will provide valuable lessons to learn animals and numbers with fun. So, our baby phone games for babies with numbers are carefully made to provoke interest and positive emotions while children play the toddler phone.

title: Triplet Baby Care Nursery Newborn Daycare
description:
The mommy of three newborn babies needs to go out for some urgent work, so she wants someone to take care of her triplet children. Mommy has dropped off them to your nursery daycare. So let’s become a good babysitter and start taking care of these naughty three with great responsibility.

The triplet newborn babies are hungry. Give them healthy food. Each one needs a separate feed like one wants cereal and the other one needs some fruits. Make them happy by giving them their favourite food and get lots of love as a best babysitter.

Time to give them a bath but triplet baby care is not easy because they don’t like it. Carefully shower them with shampoo and use various toys to avoid them for weeping.

 After this change the dress of the triplet baby. This newborn care nursery game has lots of fun while choosing a pretty dress up from different options. Being a daycare babysitter you also have the tough job to wear them diapers.

Get them to the bed for some nap. Give them a feeder so that they can sleep well. You can get toys for the triplet baby care by using coins which you will earn through different activities in this exciting newborn nursery daycare game. 

And lastly, is the sleeping time. Set the triplet in their bed, give them their pacifier, cover them in a blanket and turn the lights off. That concludes your babysitter tasks for the day. Thank you for helping mommy in her process of every day baby care. She is really happy to have a helping hand in her daycare nursery routine.

Take home TooToo Boy, make him your own and we promise that he is one of a kind, Sweet, Witty, Funny and Playful keeping you happy and entertained all the time.Brush him, Bath him, do lots of exercises, Feed him delicious food, play with him and listen to him.

Play outdoors games like Soccer, Swing, Sliding and much more games.

Working out with TooToo boy is fun.Various workouts to make you fit and different Yoga poses to find the inner joy and happiness.Performing Yoga with TooToo would be an awesome experience not to miss.

Play music instruments, sing to different tunes and of course don't forget to dance with him.

★ FEED HIM WITH DELICIOUS FOOD
Make sure to feed him healthy, good food to keep the health indicators right and keep him super fit.

★ NEVER RUN OUT OF FUN WITH RHYMES SECTION
Listen to TooToo boy dancing and humming to different rhymes ... and dance with him.

First Impressions always Matter!!...Unleash your designer skills by dressing his different outfits, yoga dresses, workout dresses and also equip him with different instruments and gym equipment.Dress to your liking and we are sure you will never run out of different outfits from his wardrobes.

★ TAKE SELFIES WITH CELEBRITY AND SHARE IT WITH THE WORLD
Take selfies with TooToo Boy and share with the world to see and like them.Different frames, poses, and cute pics.Don't forget to pout for selfies ;),

★ KIDS SAFE AND FRIENDLY
We do not collect any sort of information or access any information on your device.We also don't share any sort of information and app is kid safe.

Repeat voice in funny ways.
Play and Interact with him.Poke him, Bath him and feed him.
Different activities like music, playing, singing, dancing and exercising.
Get Rewards for Every new level unlocked with new outfits, equipment, and dances.

title: Stork — Pregnancy Tracker & Calendar App
descriptionHTML:
Stork app guides you through pregnancy day-by-day and week-by-week. Based on your due date, you will receive personalized information, the latest parenting news and health information.
You will get tools to help you prepare and feel in control every step of the way – helping you achieve a happy, healthy pregnancy.

To get started, simply enter your baby's due date. All health content is based on information from experts, so you can feel confident and prepared for the changes to your baby and body.

Explore helpful pregnancy tools like baby size and weight visualizer, contraction timer, pregnancy weight chart, hospital bag list and newborn shopping list.

Feature highlights:
- A social network for pregnant women;
- Daily and weekly pregnancy info;
- Beautiful images;
- Personal diary;
- Pregnancy weight log and chart;
- Contraction timer;
- Hospital bag list;
- Newborn shopping list;
- Baby size and weight visualizer;
- Mother's abdomen photos;
- Pregnancy week by week info;
- Articles, tips and tools;
- And much more!

----------------------------

You must note that use of this app is for informational purposes only, does not provide medical advice or diagnosis, is not intended to replace or be a substitute for any medical advice concerning you or your children, and you should always contact your medical advisors if you require medical related advice.
In turn, you understand that data you provide via the app does not constitute protected health information, as defined under the us health insurance portability and accountability act (“HIPAA”) or under similar legislation in your local jurisdiction.
summary: Explore helpful pregnancy tools!

- design improvements;
- bug fixes

title: Homemade Baby Food Recipes - By Age
description:
Why make homemade baby food?. You don’t have to be a master in the kitchen to make your own baby food.

While convenient, commercial baby foods may lose vitamins and nutrients during processing, as well as the “yumminess” that can make your baby excited to try new foods and combinations.

In this app you will find great recipes categorized by age, also a brief description on type and consistency of food recommended for your child age.

Recipes included here:

Sweet Potato Puree Recipe 
Pea Puree
Banana Puree
Avocado Puree
Carrot Puree
Beets and Blueberry Mash
Spinach with White Yams
Pumpkin Thyme Puree
Avocado and Banana
Butternut Squash & Pear Puree
Fish, Carrot, And Leek Puree
Quinoa Ratatouille
Baby Beef Stew
Creamy Provencal Chicken
Cherry And Mint Greek Yogurt Baby Food Puree

App is always updating with new recipes.

title: Play Phone for Kids - Fun educational babies toy
description:
Toy Phone Fun for Kids! BabyFirst’s Play Phone for Kids 

It’s no secret that kids love getting their cute little hands on your phone! Now, they can safely play with yours and learn numbers, too. 


Play Phone for Kids is the best toy phone app out there! It simulates a real-life phone experience for babies who can pretend to answer the phone, video chat, send emojis and dial. This kids app features some of the most beloved characters from the BabyFirst TV network including Harry the Bunny, VocabuLarry, and Peekaboo. It even offers a Music Player to keep the fun going!


Benefits for kids: 


• Gives children the chance to learn numbers 0-9
• Allows your baby to pretend to talk to characters
• Encourages emotional and social development
• Dozens of animations and sweet sounds
• Supports hand-eye coordination 


✰ 2nd Edition of the Award-Winning Play Phone App ✰ 
The huge hit, Play Phone, was the iKids Best Preschool Game App winner of 2015. Play Phone 2 offers even more fun, with several exciting new features!


✰ 6 Main Phone Functions for Kids ✰
• Dial – Babies can get familiar with numbers 0-9 as they push the buttons on the toy phone dial
• Video Chat – Play Phone for Kids uses the selfie camera on your phone to simulate a real face-to-face video call!
• Text – Your baby can send adorable emojis and get them back from their character friends
• Answer – Incoming calls pop up to get your little one excited to answer the call
• Music Player – Sweet music to engage babies and toddlers
• Funny Cam – Take photos in funny frames and put cute stickers on them 


✰ Learning On the Go! ✰
This kids app is perfect for when you’re out and about in the car, at a restaurant or waiting in line. With Play Phone for Kids, your children can talk to their new friends at BabyFirst and learn numbers too, while you’re out on the town.


✰  BabyFirst - a Wealth of Experience with Toddlers✰
BabyFirst is a global TV network for tots, toddlers and parents alike. Created by experts, BabyFirst aims to provide children with the necessary tools to learn language and numbers. Visit www.babyfirsttv.com to learn more


To find more trusted kid’s apps from the BabyFirst family search "BF123" in Google Play! 


And check out our fun & educational videos on YouTube! https://www.youtube.com/user/BabyFirstTV

An infinity of joy!

comments: This was one of my sons favorite apps. The most recent update seems to have ruined it. Several characters have disappeared from the video chat part and the 3 videos are completely gone. Update (3/2019): Company responded quickly. After some time they did bring back the 3 videos. However, not all the characters returned to the video chat and they did not add any new characters.

I Downloaded this game for my 10m daughter, there's a lot of buffering going on and it makes me sad for her because she gets super excited. Then the call ends or just repeats itself over and over. The camera doesn't work, it's all black and won't take her picture. Just a little disappointed knowing this is the newest app compared to the original.

A recently added pop-up asking if more of a particular character is wanted has made the app clumsy and unusable. When the app didn't have that feature the call would simply end and my son could pick a new character to call or get more Color Crew without an app crashing prompt. I have to close and reopen the app every other call.

Right now, the app has an ad that appears everytime a video call with a character ends and I have to reset the whole app everytime. This happens after 2 'video calls' and I hope this gets fixed. Otherwise my daughter loves the app! Please fix this bug!

2yr old loves it, but camera doesn't work only shows a black screen. So we haven't been able to personalize it with her picture. The whole reason I got the app was so she'd have a play camera instead of getting into mine all the time. Other than that I like the app.

title: Baby Doctor Office Clinic
description:
Baby Doctors Office Clinic is an app for little kids. Its a chance to be the doctor!

Take little baby junior girl or boy to see the doctor. 
Use a thermometer and check babys health. Give some medicine and pills to help recover baby. A fun filled doctor game that lets you check problems of other baby patients and fix them. 

From injecting medicine syringes to zapping germs in the body- you get to be the doctor and you decide how to give treatment.

Play in a wonderful app where you are the doctor with a cute nurse and you have to cure baby kids.
Get in the Doctors role and check the heartbeat with stethoscope, measure temperature using thermometer, diagnose hearts with the electrocardiogram, treat with syringes, eye drops, cough syrup and bandages.

Make sure baby never catches a disease or cold or a running nose on a flu. Treat your little patients and give them the hospital care they deserve. This app is the best experience to treat patients and give them the cure against the diseases they are suffering from. 

We will administer an oxygen mask to breathe better, and this time the baby will enjoy. With tweezers you'll need to evacuate every one of the thistles that kid has close by, feet and his midriff. Utilizing an extraordinary arrangement you'll clean injuries and wounds and I'll make an infusion into a vein to forestall disease, at that point you'll give a drinking syrup for mouth sanitization as blood spilled out of his mouth. 


We'll give him a lollipop that will enjoy, we will administer a tonic syrup, and to be as good and happy, we will play with the baby and the toys that baby's mother brought in the hospital where he was investigated . 

You should pick a swathe and apply it on his injuries, however precisely in light of the fact that it damages and we don't need him to cry. Since he lost much blood we will manage an IV, and after that we will put a breathing apparatus all over, so he can inhale less demanding


Hospital is a fun place now, since it has become so easy now to treat your patients little doc with the help of nurse, injection, medicine & all the other doctor tools that will help you treat & cure your patients quickly and bring smile on their faces back.

title: Baby Panda's Hospital
description:
Have your children ever dreamed of working as a doctor in a hospital? Now, there’s a chance of them to become a great doctor and take care of animal patients at Baby Panda’s Hospital!

Baby Panda’s Hospital is a free educational game designed to help children overcome their fear of doctors and hospitals, develop good hygiene habits and empathy for others. 

Let your children take charge of their own hospital! Take on the role of a doctor and help the animal patients get better!


Features:
♥ 6 different adorable animal patients
♥ 11 fun and interactive mini hospital games
♥Real hospital scene helps baby overcome their fear of doctors and hospitals
♥ Play as a doctor to help treat sick animals 

About BabyBus

At BabyBus, we dedicate ourselves to sparking kids' creativity, imagination and curiosity,and designing our products through the kids' perspective to help them explore the world on their own.

Now BabyBus offers a wide variety of products, videos and other educational content for over 400 million fans from ages 0-8 around the world! We have released over 200 children's educational apps, over 2500 episodes of nursery rhymes and animations of various themes spanning the Health, Language, Society, Science, Art and other fields.

title: First Words for baby - UK English (100 flashcards)
description:
First Words - UK English will help your baby or toddler learn new words using interactive flash cards with a bold and simple art style, fun sounds, clear speech and large text.

⭐Featured in the article '10 educational apps that toddlers will love' on the Mother&Baby website: "If you're looking for an app to help your tot with their speech, or just to teach them different words, then this app is a must to download!"

⭐Recommended by flyingwithababy.com for advice on flying with children (including baby & toddler): "This is for the UK readers. It has UK spellings and pronunciations that are clear for your little one to understand."

⭐Recommended by smartsprogs.co.uk for guides & product reviews for babies: "This is one of the best educational apps for 3-year-olds as it encourages speech and word recognition in a fun and charming way."

⭐Designed with a UK Primary School Teacher aimed at babies and toddlers (18 months - 4 years). This app will teach your children more than 120 first words using UK English spelling and spoken with a British accent.

• Made in Britain
• Designed for babies and toddlers
• Ideal for nursery/playgroup/preschool
• British words, UK English spelling
• British voice narration (two genders)
• FREE

⭐Boost vocabulary baby/toddler can learn over 120 simple first words in English. Full app has over 400 words (more advanced words for toddlers). 230 pictures in free app, 750 in full app: Simple cartoons for babies, swap to photos for toddlers. Kids will love being able to hear the words spoken with a choice of either a male or female voice. Your baby/toddler is sure to have fun with over 40 sounds and 5 silly sound effects in free app, 140 sounds in full app.

⭐First Words - UK English features 11 fun flash card categories for kids with common words including: animals 🐘, clothes 👒, vehicles 🚌, food 🍊, body 👣, colours 🟥🟩🟦, home ⏰, shapes 🔺, toys 🧸, numbers 🔢 and outside 🌳. 3 special interactive categories in free app (4 in full app) show an alternate word to keep your baby/toddler engaged.

⭐Lift the flap! Your baby/toddler can have fun guessing the hidden word on each flashcard using quiz mode, great for practicing what has been learnt. Kids can enjoy learning by playing together with parents, grandparents or carers. (Large text makes it easy to read from a distance)

⭐Ideal for use at nursery or preschool where children will play and learn at the same time. Additional uses: a speech therapy tool for kids and adults; a resource for learning English as a foreign language.

⚙️Hard to read? Make the word on each flash card easier to read by changing the size or colour of the text. Kids never get stuck! Navigation buttons always shown (size can be changed). Kids can learn first words anywhere on either phone or tablet (100% offline with screen rotation compatible flashcards). Slideshow with autoplay & screen lock to hear words without baby/toddler needing to touch screen. Simplify by switching off background colours, animation and sound effects.

⚙️Watch the video to see how to tailor the experience to you and your munchkins (kids)!

⭐Download First Words - UK English to teach your children new words today!

⭐For younger children see our new app Animal Sounds for baby featuring 100 flashcards aimed at babies (6 - 18 months).

ℹ️Tested on babies! We made this app for our children (1 x baby and 1 x toddler) to help them learn to speak English like us! Please tell us what your children like about it and what we could do better with a review or email. Follow us on Twitter (@munchkinstudio): https://twitter.com/munchkinstudio

comments: Great app. Downloaded it on my phone and the simple layout, bright colours, clear accent-less English voices and compelling layout and game aspects were an instant winner. The ability to change between male and female voices and to choose between pictures or drawings means that this could keep most kids occupied and happy - and UK, not American English is always good!

My 3 year old son has been playing this over the last 2 months and he loves it! He's learnt practically all of the words and tells me each word as he plays it. It's a relief to find an app that doesn't use US English for the pronunciation or the words. The text is very clear and choosing the pictures and voices is great. Autoplay is very handy too! Thank you very much!
Neat app. Perfect for teaching and quiz mode is a great idea. Was a bit thrown by "Paint" though. I guessed Brush from the pic. 😂
Great for the children, they really got into the game and had hours of fun learning.

title: ParentPal: My Parenting Expert
description:
ParentPal™ is an all-in-one personal parenting coach from Teaching Strategies® in partnership with the creators of Baby Einstein. The app provides tools and a daily roadmap to take the guesswork out of parenting. It assists you in providing the right daily experiences to help your children from birth to age 5 reach their key developmental milestones and thrive.  

Parenting is hard enough without feeling like you need to become a child development expert—or an organizational wizard mastering various methods to track feeding, growth, health, and first-did-it moments. 

As the leaders in early childhood and pre-school curriculum for childcare centers, pre-K programs, and school districts across the country, we’ve done that work for you. We collaborated with the creators of the award-winning Baby Einstein, consulted with pediatricians, and analyzed the guidelines of more than 20 national organizations. The result is a super-engaging and easy-to-use parenting coach and family engagement resource. 

Parents are born the day their babies are. But unlike other worthy challenges you might have tried before—like training for a race, losing weight, or cooking chef-inspired meals—it’s a scary time to learn on the job. That’s because 80% of the human brain is formed by age 3, and it’s largely dependent on the quality of stimuli and experiences provided by parents and caregivers. 

Each day, ParentPal replaces the frantic Internet searches and worry about what’s “normal” and what to do next with confident engagement and research-based guidance…plus tracking tools, memory books, personal trends, and easy, one-handed usability. 
 
FEATURES:
•	Daily Plan recommends activities and routines appropriate for your child’s age 
•	Diary shows all your reported events each day for easy recall
•	Milestones tracking identifies and guides the key developmental milestones each month
•	Sleep Tracking measures sleep and plays music that restarts automatically if your child awakens and cries
•	Health and Growth tracking record height, weight, health symptoms, vaccines, and doctors visits 
•	A library of 3200+ research-based activities and media
•	The ability to connect your entire caregiving team: the daily plan and data capture remain the same across handoffs from Mom to Dad, grandma, aunt, teacher, or nanny during the day. 
•	WeeSchool™, an optional curricular program for parents and professional childcare providers looking for a more comprehensive, turnkey schooling program
•	Memory books to capture, preserve, and share photos and videos 
•	Support for multiple children
•	Award-winning music designed to expose even infants to key elements of music, syntax, tempo, and rhythm, with classical favorites by Mozart and Beethoven as well as popular children’s songs
•	Smart Shopping recommendations to save time and money by prioritizing just those toys and books your child really needs for healthy development and preschool readiness, with links to Amazon
•	Buy one, give one—for every paid annual subscription, we will donate a free subscription to a family in need
•	No in-app ads
•	Trends and insight charts to track progress

UNMATCHED CHILD DEVELOPMENT EXPERTISE:
•	Teaching Strategies is the #1 provider of early childhood curriculum and developmental assessment in the country across private, public, and Head Start Programs. 
•	Baby Einstein was the leading baby media program in the country
•	ParentPal incorporates the Ireton Child Development Review (CDR), research-based milestones—the same milestones pediatricians use. 

SUBSCRIPTION PRICING AND TERMS:
ParentPal offers two auto-renewing subscription options:
$12.99/month 
$119/year (that’s equivalent to $9.99 monthly)
The first two weeks are free and you can cancel within that time without a charge. 

The subscription will auto-renew unless turned off in your iTunes Account Settings at least 24 hours before the current period ends.
descriptionHTML:
ParentPal™ is an all-in-one personal parenting coach from Teaching Strategies® in partnership with the creators of Baby Einstein. The app provides tools and a daily roadmap to take the guesswork out of parenting. It assists you in providing the right daily experiences to help your children from birth to age 5 reach their key developmental milestones and thrive.

Parenting is hard enough without feeling like you need to become a child development expert—or an organizational wizard mastering various methods to track feeding, growth, health, and first-did-it moments.

As the leaders in early childhood and pre-school curriculum for childcare centers, pre-K programs, and school districts across the country, we’ve done that work for you. We collaborated with the creators of the award-winning Baby Einstein, consulted with pediatricians, and analyzed the guidelines of more than 20 national organizations. The result is a super-engaging and easy-to-use parenting coach and family engagement resource.

Parents are born the day their babies are. But unlike other worthy challenges you might have tried before—like training for a race, losing weight, or cooking chef-inspired meals—it’s a scary time to learn on the job. That’s because 80% of the human brain is formed by age 3, and it’s largely dependent on the quality of stimuli and experiences provided by parents and caregivers.

Each day, ParentPal replaces the frantic Internet searches and worry about what’s “normal” and what to do next with confident engagement and research-based guidance…plus tracking tools, memory books, personal trends, and easy, one-handed usability.

FEATURES:
• Daily Plan recommends activities and routines appropriate for your child’s age
• Diary shows all your reported events each day for easy recall
• Milestones tracking identifies and guides the key developmental milestones each month
• Sleep Tracking measures sleep and plays music that restarts automatically if your child awakens and cries
• Health and Growth tracking record height, weight, health symptoms, vaccines, and doctors visits
• A library of 3200+ research-based activities and media
• The ability to connect your entire caregiving team: the daily plan and data capture remain the same across handoffs from Mom to Dad, grandma, aunt, teacher, or nanny during the day.
• WeeSchool™, an optional curricular program for parents and professional childcare providers looking for a more comprehensive, turnkey schooling program
• Memory books to capture, preserve, and share photos and videos
• Support for multiple children
• Award-winning music designed to expose even infants to key elements of music, syntax, tempo, and rhythm, with classical favorites by Mozart and Beethoven as well as popular children’s songs
• Smart Shopping recommendations to save time and money by prioritizing just those toys and books your child really needs for healthy development and preschool readiness, with links to Amazon
• Buy one, give one—for every paid annual subscription, we will donate a free subscription to a family in need
• No in-app ads
• Trends and insight charts to track progress

UNMATCHED CHILD DEVELOPMENT EXPERTISE:
• Teaching Strategies is the #1 provider of early childhood curriculum and developmental assessment in the country across private, public, and Head Start Programs.
• Baby Einstein was the leading baby media program in the country
• ParentPal incorporates the Ireton Child Development Review (CDR), research-based milestones—the same milestones pediatricians use.

SUBSCRIPTION PRICING AND TERMS:
ParentPal offers two auto-renewing subscription options:
$12.99/month
$119/year (that’s equivalent to $9.99 monthly)
The first two weeks are free and you can cancel within that time without a charge.

The subscription will auto-renew unless turned off in your iTunes Account Settings at least 24 hours before the current period ends.

Upgrade to the Diaper tracker to include potty events. Addition of 300 new Mighty Minutes activities, eight reference guides and articles, and eight new songs and three new albums. Miscellaneous performance improvements and bug fixes.

title: Baby Grow
description:
Have you got what it takes to raise a healthy baby? Keep malnutrition at bay with the right mix of nutrients, and fight off infections with different treatment options. Discover the hidden causes of malnutrition through this fun and free educational game.

Baby Grow is brought to you by Centre of the Cell, an interactive science centre based at Queen Mary University of London. Developed using child growth and malnutrition research conducted in the UK, Zambia and Zimbabwe, this multilingual app offers English, Bemba and Shona language options.

Players can also explore:
• food groups and healthy eating
• types of malnutrition
• current research into the causes and consequences of malnutrition

Produced in partnership with Wellcome, the Medical Research Council, Zvitambo, Tropgan and the Royal Society.

title: BabyPhone with Music, Sounds of Animals for Kids
description:
Baby Phone with Music, Animals is an educational and entertaining game for children of early preschool age. Playing baby telephone kids can easily learn 123 for kids, animals for toddlers and animals sounds for baby. 
Main features of the phone for kids:
1) Kids learning animals - a snake, a monkey, a bear, a cat, a mouse, a horse, a goat, a fox, a duck, an elephant, a pig, a sheep, a parrot, a penguin, a lion, a tiger, a chicken, a cow, a dog. So, the kid phone includes both wild and domestic animals for kids. Moreover, the kids phone presents animals for kids from different climate zones. For example, there is learning animals from mixed forests, polar region, etc. 
2) Animal sounds for kids learning free. Our babyphone has a function to pretend phone calls for kids from animals. During these real phone calls for kids free app makes animals produce animal voices for kids. Playing toy phone for babies toddlers will hear a pig grunting, a tiger growling, a cow mooing, a dog barking, a snake, a cat mewing, a mouse, a duck quack and other animals making animals voice for kids.
3) Learning numbers for preschoolers. Children love to play phone for kids, especially press the buttons of a toy phone. Our phone for kids all in one is an interactive baby toy phone in which babies can push the bright colorful buttons with numerals for kids and learn numbers for toddlers from 0 to 9.
4) Our baby mobile phone trains fine motor skills, develops intelligence, memory, logic, mindfulness, curiosity.
5) The toddler phone app is available in several languages - English, Russian and some others.
6) All our educational games for kindergarteners are free to download, and this baby cell phone is not an exception. Baby phone app free will save your family budget and provide baby first play phone of high quality.
7) Our baby phone kids was created in the tight cooperation of children illustrators and pedagogues. That’s why the kids phone app has such a clear, simple and intuitive interface easy to deal with even for the youngest babies. 
8) Our babyphone game has great entertaining potential . It’s not only animal learning games with animals sounds for baby and numbers for toddlers free, but also kids entertainment. The children phone is developed to play phone for kids call in such a way that animals will call your baby from time to time. So, baby phone numbers and animals will never let your toddler get bored.
Our baby phone with animals can be recommended as:
- educational games for 2 year olds (or learning games for toddlers age 2);
- learning games for toddlers age 3; 
- educational games for 4 year olds; 
- educational games for 5 year olds.
How to play baby mode for your phone:
First of all, you should download the toddler phone on your smartphone or tablet. The baby phone number animal meets your kid with beautiful interface with buttons. The navigation of kids baby phone is very simple. When your baby presses the yellow button with a handset in the educational games for kids baby phone 3 4 years, the baby animal phone opens the phone book with animal cards. In order to play phone games for kids and call a certain animal, to touch the image of the animal will be enough. The baby phone games for babies will never ignore your child and the animal will answer for sure. The baby telephone games are not only baby animal games, but also musical games for kids. When your baby presses the blue button of the toy phone games (with the image of a note on it), the kids phone games begin to play music notes in the direct and reverse order. If your kid presses the light blue button of the kids toy phone learning games (with the “play” inscription on it), there will be heard a nice melody in the educational games for kids nursery. The task of toddler learning games here is to press the necessary button which the kids phone calls will show with the help of animation.

title: Homemade Baby Food Recipes Ideas
description:
These homemade baby food recipes are simple and rewarding to make – become head chef for a very special little customer!

While convenient, commercial baby foods may lose vitamins and nutrients during processing, as well as the “yumminess” that can make your baby excited to try new foods and combinations. Each recipes mentioned the appropriate age of the baby that can eat the foods in the recipe also simple to make and a way more nutritious being homemade.

The benefits of making your own baby food are enormous …
# You know exactly what your baby is eating 
# You know that the ingredients are fresh and healthy
# You will save money
# And most importantly making your own baby food is tremendously satisfying – for you AND your baby.

To keep things simple, recipes on this app are grouped according to age – so you can be sure that the ingredients are safe and appropriate for your baby.

These are Some examples of Baby food recipes we provide include:

-	0-4 month
For babies age 0-4 months old, it is recommended to breast milk, but if you choose formula, there is an organic option.

- 4-6 month
Banana Applesauce Mush
Bananas puree
Pumpkin puree
Green Beans puree
Squash puree

- 6-9 Months Old
Rice Cereal
Oatmeal Cereal
Barley Cereal
Apricot Puree
Baked Apples

- 9-12 month 
Rice with peas, carrots & egg
Quinoa, black beans & corn
Tropical fruit salad
Lentil & spinach stew
Pasta with spinach & ricotta

Apps Features:
- Baby Food Rules
- Baby Food Chart (best food categories according to babies age)
- Delicious Homemade Baby Food Recipes Ideas
- Apps info (/ Privacy Policy / Disclaimers)

title: Pregnancy Week by week
description:
Welcome to Pregnancy week by week apps! 
Contents:
Pregnancy Week by week
Pregnancy health
Child birth
Birth control
Pregnancy and sex
Newborn
Baby development
Child health

Here you will find everything you want to know about the world of motherhood, including planning or preparing for pregnancy, easy and comfortable birth, breast feeding, care of the newborn, and raising a healthy, clever and happy child. 
Our intention is to give maximum useful information for future and current parents. Visit Pregnancy section of the app, if you are looking for any information related to pregnancy and its aspects, from first signs of pregnancy to how to cope with toxemia. You may be interested in articles devoted to pregnancy stuff such as choosing suitable maternity clothes, or preparation for successful and painless birth.
Sometimes things can go wrong, and sometimes a woman does not know what is going on with her. Articles on pregnancy health address the cases of stillbirth, miscarriage, phantom pregnancy, infertility. This information will allow you to cope with difficulties and to prevent them.

If you are not planning to become a mother in the near future, articles on birth control may be helpful for you in learning more about female and male contraception, effectiveness and side-effects of different birth control methods.
In articles on pregnancy milestones you will find information on characteristics of each trimester and month of pregnancy, what to do during each of them, what examinations to pass, what to eat and what food to avoid, how to deal with stress or with postpartum depression. You will learn what hormonal changes happen to a pregnant woman’s body, in what cases cesarean section is made, and other stuff. 
If you are already a happy mother of a newborn, pay your attention to Breastfeeding section. It includes issues related to a nursing period: right diet, foods to eat and to avoid, lactation, breastfeeding in public, myths and tips on breastfeeding.

Baby section concerns the topic of raising children. It will help to select a name for the newborn, to choose a baby stroller, clothes and toys for boys and girls. Here you can read about development of a newborn, child’s health, feeding and sleep, childhood diseases, education methods, how to soothe a crying baby, how to care of the child and to express love to him or her.  
There are many other aspects of parenthood and they are discussed in Family section. Some of these topics are: useful books for pregnant women and parents, fitness, relationships in the family, pets, child adoption, and others. 
Hope you find the answers to you questions here!

A guide to conception, pregnancy, taking care of the baby and being a parent. Anything you want to know on pregnancy and parenting - you may know here! Pregnancy Week by week.
Also, in our application: pregnancy diet, pregnancy stages, pregnancy tips.
Baby growth tracker during pregnancy.
Best free pregnancy apps

title: Baby Care And Dress Up: Babysitter Games
description:
Hello kids! We bring you another interesting task of handling the sweet little children. We welcome you to a daycare nursery home where you are an expert babysitter and doing the job of newborn baby care games. So kids be ready for non stop fun with cute little ones.

In this amazing babysitter game, lots of fun activities get you busy for hours. But be aware because sweet baby care is gonna be tough. To give the complete comfort to the adorable newborns you have to do lots of work.

Your baby daycare activities start with a warm bath. Lots of interesting tasks you can perform in the spa section. Give him a bubbly bath, shelves in the bathroom are full of toys. Let’s use various toys to avoid them weeping.

Now it’s time to choose a perfect dress up for sweet newborn baby care. Different costumes make them very happy. In this interesting nursery game you can even cook healthy meals for removing the appetite of cute ones. Beautiful kitchen animation gives the best experience of cooking for them.

The feeding time is the most important part of a good baby care nursery. In a fun babysitter game try different types of fruits, cereals, and candies to keep children healthy and happy.

Your job does not end here, let’s play with the babies but many interesting types of toys make it easier for you to keep them very happy. 

Finally! Now it's time to take a rest. After a long day, he will sleep well in his pretty cot.  So kids what are you waiting for! Hurry up, install this amazing newborn babysitter game and have a wonderful experience of baby daycare nursery game.

Come on! Give the best care to the little one and enjoy the sweet baby game.

title: Draw, baby!
description:
Draw, baby! - простая и очень увлекательная рисовалка для самых маленьких. Ваш малыш сможет рисовать, раскрашивать или обводить буквы. 

Отсутствие мелких деталей и набор только необходимых функций, спокойные цвета позволят ребёнку самостоятельно справиться с заданиями и не утомят его.

Малыш с пользой проведёт время в дороге, в очереди или просто играя !
descriptionHTML:
Draw, baby! - простая и очень увлекательная рисовалка для самых маленьких. Ваш малыш сможет рисовать, раскрашивать или обводить буквы.

Отсутствие мелких деталей и набор только необходимых функций, спокойные цвета позволят ребёнку самостоятельно справиться с заданиями и не утомят его.

Малыш с пользой проведёт время в дороге, в очереди или просто играя !

Теперь больше картинок для раскрашивания!

Устранены ошибки, возникающие при загрузки изображений.

comments: 1. There isn't an undo button. 2. The game is for everyone creative not for 8+. 3. The drawing space needs to me bigger. 4. The controls are too small. PLEASE add / fix this!
Amazing! My sister was entertained for a long time! She is not able to be separated from the phone! Its truly a great app for 1-4.

I think it does need a undo button because if I have made a mistake on the drawing then I press the bin button and it is gone. So it needs one so I do not have to keep useing the rubber button. I gave it 2 stars because you do not need to be told 2 times for the same thing do you? The answer should be no if not please let me know what you think about it!🚫🚫 This is not acceptable for your game I have to agree with the offer prison I might even bin the game if you do not put in a undo button!
Its nice but i think it needs a undo button, so you don't have to erase it so much i only gave it 3 stars because of that, PLEASE FIX IT!!!
Kids picked it up almost immediately, quickly becoming a favorite. I just wish there was multitouch functionality so the kids didn't have to take turns.

title: Ice Princess Pregnant Mom and Baby Care Games
description:
Welcome to my new baby and pregnant mommy daycare home where an ice princess and baby is waiting for an expert babysitter. Let’s take the responsibility for giving best care to the winter princess’s cute newborn. So, get ready for an amazing adventure of baby care game.

In this amazing mom and baby game, we have lots of fun activities for our kids who love to play princess games and for the pregnant moms who are looking out for some entertainment during their maternity time. This mommy care game is where you have to take care of the pregnant mother’s feed and dress up. Let’s dress up the ice princess mommy and the little one in their amazing royal dresses. 

Time to find the best babysitter…The pregnant mom is looking for a babysitter who can take care of her little newborn ice baby and manage the baby bath,dress up and feed.  Let’s be a babysitter and have interesting experiences with lots of fun activities of winter princess fashion dressing and babysitting. Help the mom and baby with their daily activities in the royal palace. 


By playing my new baby care games, you can learn what to do for keeping ice princess pregnant mommy healthy. You can also enjoy taking care of an adorable newborn when it comes to daycare home for the first time. Many funny tasks of kids nursing games give you hours of fun. Not just that we have some fun awaiting for our pregnant moms as well who love to play mom and baby care game. 

Let’s Start with mommy care by giving her healthy feed and cooking delicious meals, juices for winter princess mommy and prove yourself a good pregnant mom daycare babysitter. Be the baby doctor and do regular check ups on the ice baby. Check mother’s blood pressure and give medicine. 

In my new mom and baby app, choose beautiful dresses for the lovely ice princess pregnant mommy and make her motherhood maternity time very special. Be the best caretaker for our mom to be by doing the necessary time management.

Let’s start the newborn’s room decorations with a lovely winter princess. Go out for baby shopping and buy lots of pretty  items for perfect designing. Be creative and beautifully design the daycare nursery for welcoming the child. Do good preparations and have lots of fun.

Finally the new born baby is here and responsibilities of the babysitter has just started. Give the sweet newborn baby a warm bath and choose a beautiful dress for the ice baby. Play with her and have fun.

This winter princess pregnant mom and baby care nursing home also has an amazing adventure of four mini-games. Start painting on diapers, collect money and do some baby shopping for non stop enjoyment.

So install this wonderful ice princess pregnant mom and baby care app and make the motherhood maternity care very interesting and special for pregnant mommy and newborn. Enjoy…

title: Kuzhandhai Nalam Tamil
description:
Kuzhandhai Nalam - குழந்தை நலம் 

This application captures important and essential age old traditional means of bringing up infants. 

Have added close to 150+ tips that can be shared with all by social media - WhatsApp, SMS, Email and more.

Added a new section with close to 80+ general tips for bringing up babies. Also contains IAP vaccine schedule and the details of Vaccine.

These notes are from various Tamil magazines in late 90's and internet sources like koodal. Credit for the entire content should go to those wonderful amma's of Tamil Nadu for sharing their knowledge. Special thanks to Seetha madam for sharing these notes. 

Important: Request users to exercise great caution and discussion with elders and doctors before trying any of the tips with child. Kindly exercise extreme care. I take no credit or responsibility for any of the tips mentioned in the app.

App covers following details,

1. Baby Well being tips
2. Baby bathing
3. Baby food
4. Home remedies for Babies - like stomach pain etc
5. Baby Stomach Worm removal tips

Additional tips added:

Added additional tips,

1. Baby Brushing
2. Baby Medicine
3. Baby Sleep
4. Baby Obese
5. Baby Eye care
6. Baby Digestion
7. Baby Bathroom
8. Baby Diaper
9. Baby Memory
10. Baby Cough
11. Baby Honey as medicine?
12. Baby Father role

I wanted to make this available on Android platform,

1.  To ensure millions of mothers around the world who stay away from their amma and paati's use this app and bring up their child better

2. Promoting Tamil apps as a small service to the community

3. Personally I have seen items like "Vasambu" being administered for my small baby and he finding immense relief from pain. I hope this app would benefit some Parent and Child from TN living anywhere across the globe get benefit. 

If you like the app, please do rate it and share it with your friends. Your feedback is something that I value you a lot. 

Dedicate this app to: all those beautiful babies who make life of everyone around better with their wonderful smiles!!!

This app covers, Baby wellness tips, Baby Bathing tips, Baby tips, Kuzhandhai nalam, Kuzhandhai valarpu, Baby food tips, Baby food, Baby Home remedies, Tamil apps, Paati vaidhiyam, Paapa Nalam, Kuzhandhai Unnavu

title: BMI : My Child BMI Calculator
description:
Although simple to use!

Made of accurate material!

Check our child body mass index with the BMI calculator! (Adjustable adult)

It is based on the Growth Chart of the Child and Adolescents, Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, Ministry of Health and Welfare.

The ages on the Pediatric Growth Chart are 2 to 18 years old.

Check your physical condition every day!

Calculator reference
-Growth chart for children and adolescents: Ministry of Health and Welfare, Disease Control Division, Korean Pediatric Society

-Adult: Based on National Health Insurance Corporation data


[ main function ]
1.Calculate BMI
2. Weight, age button long press the number automatic count
3. Save function (+ Backup)
4. Chart

[Permission required]
-None at this time.

Try the calculator and rate it if you like it!

If you have any additional feature requests or errors, please contact us via review or email!

Email: kjs100183@gmail.com

title: Baby Panda’s First Words
description:
Search for "BabyBus" for even more free panda games for you to try!

Baby Panda’s First Words is a colorful and easy to use educational game that helps young children, especially toddlers and pre-k kids, learn everyday words. It includes four categories of carefully selected words, which will help your baby develop language skills while having fun. 

By simply touching the screen, your baby will be able to interact with various fun games and learn simple words through cute animations and clear pronunciation. Download Baby Panda’s First Words! Let your baby create a very own sticker album! 

 Fun features:
♥ More than 60 words stickers with four categories
♥ Professional pronunciation of words 
♥ Fun animations and colorful scenarios
♥ Easy to use game environment

About BabyBus
—————
At BabyBus, we dedicate ourselves to sparking kids' creativity, imagination and curiosity,and designing our products through the kids' perspective to help them explore the world on their own.   

Now BabyBus offers a wide variety of products, videos and other educational content for over 250 million fans from ages 0-8 around the world! We have produced more than 150 children's educational games, 700 children's songs, and animations of various themes spanning the arts, health, and science.                      
—————
Contact us: ser@babybus.com
Visit us: http://www.babybus.com

title: Nurturey: Redbook, Pregnancy, Child Health
description:
The digital Redbook+++

Pregnancy to early childhood

Intelligent assistance to manage the health and development of your child.

Dedicated to parents and children, our mission is to solve anxiety out of parenting. #ChildHealthMatters


Give your child the best start in life:

Children achieve 80% of their full potential during pregnancy and the first six years - and Nurturey helps you employ a scientific, comprehensive and proactive approach to childcare.

1. Track health indicators

- Dynamic tracking can help the early recognition of evolving conditions and promote optimal growth

- Vaccinations, height and weight charts, Z score, teeth chart and Vision health, etc.

- Kick counter, prenatal test

- Cognitive exercises and milestone tracking will stimulate brain growth. Growth milestones, Alexa Mental Math etc

2. Proactive insights/reports

- Understand emerging health needs using benchmark WHO data

3. Guide parents

- data and algorithm-driven information

- Timely and relevant information

- Pointers, FAQs and more.

Safe and Secure:

It’s my utmost priority to keep your information safe and confidential. Nurturey follows EU security guidelines and complies with GDPR.

Many of the Features in Nurturey are Free, while some (especially premium tools/features) will require payment/subscription. 

My team at Nurturey is always excited to hear from you. If you have any query, feedback or concerns, please write to us at support@nurturey.com

Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/nurtureyonweb

title: Baby Play - Games for babies
description:
"Baby play" is a collection of mini games for babies and children that learn while playing.

Enjoy with your kids with these simple applications, and stimulate their learning from the first months.
You can play with the application, from babies with few months to childrens with a few years.

Using colors, shapes, sounds, animals, candy fruits ... activate the cognitive development of your children.

It is recommended that parents and children can play together to strengthen emotional bonds while having a fun time.

It includes 6 fun games:
  - Explode the balloons
  - Play with stars of the sky (sun, stars, moon ...)
  - Identifies animals and the sounds they make
  - Learn the words and numbers
  - Associates and related shapes
  - Catch fruits and learn their names

title: Baby Care, Motherhood, Heart Rate, Mother Health
description:
Motherhood, Newborn Care, Baby Health All in One app aims to deliver every new parent with information, guides that can enhance the overall experience of pregnancy, and create a blissful journey of a lifetime.


It provides day by day details on your body changes, fetal development, newborn care, and your health, and more...


Motherhood, Newborn Care, Baby Health All in One app is to provide answers to question that every pregnant mommy has lingering back of her mind. It lets your partner be a part of pregnancy with all the tips and information at hand.


Motherhood, Newborn Care, Baby Health All in One is not the end, rather, it is the beginning of a long journey through motherhood. Our app offers a powerful knowledge base and a multitude of resources on infant care, breastfeeding, postpartum care, and the latest information on ailments commonly affecting babies. 


Are you sure that you know the best parenting tips and methods? Are you truly ready for fatherhood and motherhood? Aside from questions, we also have practical parenting tips. 


Motherhood, Newborn Care, Baby Health All in One is a great resource for parents who want to learn about being a mother or father. Here you can also read about positive parenting techniques and child development. They are very useful for new parents who just experience the ups and downs of being a mother and father.


Motherhood, Newborn Care, Baby Health All in One app makes it simple to track all of your child’s important information for doctors and caregivers, as well as share all the exciting milestones of his or her development with friends and family.


Would you like to know how many diapers have you changed today or how much milk your little one drank? This baby feeding and diaper tracker provides a daily summary of breastfeeding duration, milk amount, and other information about baby activities from a newborn log.


Motherhood, Newborn Care, Baby Health All in One App is a handy and reliable assistant for breastfeeding your newborn baby. You can track breastfeeding, bottle feeding, solid food feeding and milk pumping. You can save diaper changing, sleeping periods, and the results of your baby's height and weight measurements.


Motherhood, Newborn Care, Baby Health All in One app is also a pregnancy tracker app that can be personalized so your partner, the future grandparents, and your best friend can join in on the fun. With this app, they’ll be able to follow your baby’s development in the womb. Keep them up-to-date with your pregnancy by inviting them to download the app today.

title: Baby Heartbeat Monitor, Fetal Doppler, Face Yoga
description:
Baby Heartbeat Monitor, Fetal Doppler, Heart Rate, Face Yoga app is the most accurate heart rate monitor.  Heart Rate & Baby Monitor helps you measure your pulse (heart rate) using your phone camera, learn how the numbers relate to your general wellness, do facial exercises to get rid of wrinkles, perform effective workouts to get in shape and track your progress.

Measure accurately your pulse and heartbeat zone with your heart rate & health monitor after sleeping or during workouts & training. 


Baby Heartbeat Monitor, Fetal Doppler, Heart Rate app provides : 

* fetal doppler  
* baby doppler
* baby heartbeat monitor
* pulse rate
* unborn heart
* fetal heartbeat listener
* instant hearth rate
* pregnancy tracker
* measure heart rate
* face yoga
* face fitness for youthful skin 
* facial exercises for face health 
* getting rid of wrinkles
* handcrafted daily face yoga workouts
* daily tips that that help you see results faster

A fresh look, fightingage, a chiseled chin, Hollywood cheekbones, smooth skin tone, smooth, wrinkle-free and free of sagging skin, radiant with youth and health - absolutely natural by Face Yoga.

• Just hold your phone or tablet and simply cover the back camera with your finger to read your pulse. It's never been easier to know what your heart rate is! Without any external hardware, just using the built-in camera/sensor of your smartphone or tablet, you can get accurate readings almost instantly.

Your Improvements  in fitness: 
• Built-in high-intensity circuit training exercises that only take a couple of minutes to complete. It can be very useful while exercising, if you're under stress, if you have a heart-related medical condition, or even just out of curiosity. See how your heart rate relates to your fitness and endurance.  Identifies heart rate training zones (Rest, Fat burn, Cardio, and Peak)

According to Mayo Clinic, a normal resting heartbeat rate for adults ranges from 60 to 100 beats per minute (BPM). Heart rate can be affected by stress, anxiety, depression, emotions, activity level, fitness level, body composition, and medication use.  Generally, a lower heartbeat at rest implies more efficient heart function and better cardiovascular fitness.
 
When will you use Heart Rate & Baby Monitor?
For accurate measurement, Heart Rate & Baby Monitor should be used daily to measure heartbeat or pulse. Recommended tagging your heart rate after sleeping or during workouts to separate resting heart rate from workout heart rate.
 
Another feature of this app is the Baby monitor app.
Baby Heartbeat Monitor, Fetal Doppler, Heart Rate app is a universal video and audio nanny and babysitter for your phone, tablet, or computer. Hear every noise, stream live video through a camera, watch and soothe your child remotely. 

Easy to Use: The app requires two devices. One stays in the child’s room while the other one stays with you. No registration or connection adjustments are required and the initial setup takes less than 30 seconds.

Every Noise/ Sound: Are you not sure what the little sound you barely hear is? Sensitize the sound for a moment so you can hear every tiny sound from your baby’s room.

Talk to your baby: Simply press a button and speak. Your child will be always one tap away from you.
 
DISCLAIMER
- Baby Heartbeat Monitor, Fetal Doppler, Heart Rate app should not be used as a medical device.
- In some devices, this app may make the LED flash very hot.

title: Children's doctor : dentist.
description:
Children's doctor - we all love when people around us smile. We become well and happy when someone on the street gives us a smile. But for a smile to be beautiful, you need to take good care of your teeth. This applies to your pets, because in childhood they were for every kid. Like people, they also sometimes need to treat their teeth. This can be done by a special doctor - dentist. 
We present to your attention an exciting game for children - a dentist (vet clinic). 
In this entertaining game, your child is a real dentist, under the guidance of which there is a hospital for animals. The kid is entrusted with a very important and responsible task - the treatment of teeth of his four-footed pups, whose teeth began to ache heavily because of their love for sweets.
 
You have to treat them in a real dental office, use various medical instruments, such as tongs, scalpels, Burmashin and many others, to clean your four-legged friends of teeth from plaque, align them, do operations, remove cavities and fill them. After all, they all just need your help. For her, the animals will be grateful to you and very grateful.
 
Developing games for children, such as a veterinarian, contribute to the overall development of your child. They help to develop fine motor skills, coordination of movements, visual perception, attentiveness and observation, will show the baby how to treat animals, take care of them.
 
Our games for kids, such as a dentist, will teach them not only to treat their pets with love and care, but also to protect their own teeth, do not forget to clean them several times a day, because going to the dentist is not the most pleasant pastime.
 
For the purpose of comprehensive development of the child, we create applications and educational games for children that are aimed to help boys and girls develop basic motor and other skills, and also have fun, fun and useful to spend their free time.
 
All you need is to download games, install and start playing, and in the future your child can choose one of the most needed professions in the world - the dentist
 
Be sure to visit our http://yovogames.com and also we are at:
Youtube: http://www.youtube.com/channel/UCZruadkJJTuD4Bgb1F6pa3A
Twitter: https://twitter.com/YOVOstudio
Facebook: https://facebook.com/yovogames

comments: It's great for toddlers! But hey, parents, please PLEASE monitor you kid while playing this game. Ads pop up and they easily could tap on them. They range from insurance, to mattresses all the way to other games. So please, monitor your child! But everything else aside, the game is great. It's repetitive, but kids like that.

I initially thought this app would not benefit my toddler in any way, plus I was a bit bothered overall. The thing is, I wasn't paying attention & pre-judged, I was wrong. As I sat with her & watched her smiling ... I decided to join in & her concentration mixed with true laughter is all I could have asked for ! THANK YOU BY KEEPING IT SILLY FOR HER WHILE STILL PROVIDING AN HONEST LEARNING EXPERIENCE SHE'LL BENEFIT FROM !

Get rid of ads, please. Ads arent appropriate for toddlers. This is a great game, and my toddler can't play it without getting inappropriate ads or being prompted to download things. Such a shame, as she loves it.

The ad scrolling at the bottom on the screen is horrible. Every 10 seconds my 3 year old was accidently tapping it which sent it right into a full ad. She spent most of the time crying because it kept happening.
It would be more fun if there was more than 3 patients and different things to do but it is a great game also the advertisements every 10 seconds can stop anytime now that's very irritating

title: Sea Fishing for Kids - fun fishing adventure
description:
Sea fishing for Kids is an exciting fishing game and real fishing adventure for babies and kids of all ages (2+ years old). Thanks to accessible design and easy gameplay, this adventure game is also fun for elders, a great game for older people. We value our kids’ free time and imagination, so there are absolutely no ads in the game! 

This fishing game for kids is very simply exciting: you use your finger as a fishing hook to catch as much fish as you can with bubbles until you run out of bubbles or the level time finishes. But beware of sharks and other fish predators! You don’t want them on your fishing hook. Having a successful fishing adventure and gathering loot from a special crate from the middle of the sea, you can collect stars and acquire bonuses that will help you catch more fish in the future.

Compete with other players for points and get to the top of the ranking!!

Why is Sea fishing for kids great for babies and elders?
- It develops motor skills, attention and reaction through easy and entertaining activity - fishing.
- All players are able to compete with each other and share records.
- A series of fish caught in a row gives players more points, can you count them all?
- Players learn to spend their fishing bonuses carefully.
- The treasure chest hide a lot of interesting items within - pay attention to it during your fishing adventure!
- And best of all the game is free!

Starting from early years kids start to perceive the world around them, explore everything that happens in their lives. Therefore, educational games for children are now the coolest and easiest way to educate your children. Casual games like Fishing For Kids broaden babies’ imagination, teach children to be attentive, tolerant, to save for the future and to act within limited resources (stars, bubbles, time). 
Teaching games for children develop attention and memory, can help you spend more quality time together with your child or elder relative and have fun in the process!

Also check out other exciting games for kids by Dolly Games!

title: Baby Phone. Kids Game
description:
Baby Phone is a fantastic educational game aimed at babies 6 months and up to learn numbers, animal sounds, nusery rhymes, lullabies and musical notes while having fun playing. Our game will convert the smartphone into a phone for children. A phone for babies inside the real phone. Amazing. Isn't it? Your toddler will love the design and sounds. This musical educational game will entertain your babies for hours because your kid will feel is playing with your real smartphone.

Children will enjoy the different sounds and songs that will be discovered in each of the screens:

Animals: Toddlers will learn the sounds of animals like squirrels, cow, rooster, cat, dog, goat, frog or owl. There is a phone for that: the yellow phone.
Numbers: Funny numbers on the screen so that your kids learn to count and to pronounce the numbers in English. The phone for that is the blue.
Musical Notes: Touch the phone keys and make the musical notes sound: do, re, mi, fa, sol, la, and their melody. Use the red color phone for that.

Baby Phone will keep your baby entertained with nursery rhymes and funny cartoons to play with.

▶ MUSICAL STIMULATION
From childhood, the musical stimulation produces great benefits as the sense of hearing.
This game helps stimulate different areas in kids:

- The expression of feelings and ideas.
- The development of memory.
- Motor skills.
- The linguistic possibilities.

Your infant will love to learn nursery rhymes and lullabies with this game. Bring your smartphone to your kid and see how he enjoy with the phone. The game is designed for children of kindergarten age. 

▶ FIND OUT MORE EDUCATIONAL GAMES
Edujoy has more than 50 games for children of all ages; from kindergarten to the elderly. 

▶ THANK YOU FOR SUPPORTING US!
Thank you very much for playing Edujoy games. We love creating educational and fun games for you. If you have any suggestions or questions, feel free to send us your feedback or leave your comments.

In theory it would be a nice game to keep the baby busy but there is an add right at the bottom, covering a small section of the game, that they kept opening half the time i had it just to get the screen back

Says ad free it is not ad free. During old McDonald song certain animals they imitate are not optional on the "phone's" buttons like a horse but there is a squirrel. It is an ok game for a noise maker.
